member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.ComputeShaderInvocations
member.summary:
调用计算明暗器的次数。
原文： Number of times a compute shader was invoked.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.DomainShaderInvocations
member.summary:
调用域着色器的次数。
原文： Number of times a domain shader was invoked.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.HullShaderInvocations
member.summary:
调用外壳着色器的次数。
原文： Number of times a hull shader was invoked.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.PixelShaderInvocations
member.summary:
调用像素明暗器的次数。
原文： Number of times a pixel shader was invoked.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.RenderedPrimitives
member.summary:
已呈现的基元数。这可能比Cinvocation大或小，因为在一个原始体被剪短之后，它有时会被分解成多个原始体或被完全剔除。
原文： Number of primitives that were rendered. This may be larger or smaller than CInvocations because after a primitive is clipped sometimes it is either broken up into more than one primitive or completely culled.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.RasterizedPrimitives
member.summary:
发送到光栅化器的基元数。禁用光栅化器时，此值不会增加。
原文： Number of primitives that were sent to the rasterizer. When the rasterizer is disabled, this will not increment.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.GeometryShaderPrimitives
member.summary:
几何体明暗器输出的基本体数。
原文： Number of primitives output by a geometry shader.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.GeometryShaderInvocations
member.summary:
调用几何体明暗器的次数。当几何体明暗器设置为null时，此统计值可能会增加，也可能不会增加，具体取决于硬件制造商。
原文： Number of times a geometry shader was invoked. When the geometry shader is set to null, this statistic may or may not increment depending on the hardware manufacturer.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.VertexShaderInvocations
member.summary:
调用顶点明暗器的次数。Direct3D对每个顶点调用一次顶点明暗器。
原文： Number of times a vertex shader was invoked. Direct3D invokes the vertex shader once per vertex.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.InputAssemblerPrimitives
member.summary:
由输入汇编程序读取的基元数。根据所使用的原始拓扑，此数字可能不同。例如，带有6个顶点的三角形条将生成4个三角形，而带有6个顶点的三角形列表将生成2个三角形。
原文： Number of primitives read by the input assembler. This number can be different depending on the primitive topology used. For example, a triangle strip with 6 vertices will produce 4 triangles, however a triangle list with 6 vertices will produce 2 triangles.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics.InputAssemblerVertices
member.summary:
由输入汇编程序读取的顶点数。
原文： Number of vertices read by input assembler.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PipelineStatistics
member.summary:
包含有关图形管道活动的查询信息。
原文： Contains query information about graphics pipeline activity.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.TimestampQueryData.IsDisjointed
member.summary:
只有当isdisjoint为false时，getdata为时间戳查询返回的时间戳才是可靠的。
原文： If this is true, something occurred in between the query's Begin and End calls that caused the timestamp counter to become discontinuous or disjoint, such as unplugging the AC chord on a laptop, overheating, or throttling up/down due to laptop savings events. The timestamp returned by GetData for a timestamp query is only reliable if IsDisjointed is false.

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.DirectSound3DAlgorithmGuid.NoVirtualization3DAlgorithm
member.summary:
三维输出映射为正常的左右立体平移。向左90度时，声音仅从左扬声器发出；向右90度时，声音仅从右扬声器发出。垂直轴将被忽略，但由于距离而导致的体积缩放除外。多普勒频移和体积缩放仍在应用中，但该缓冲区不进行三维滤波。这是最有效的软件实现，但不提供虚拟三维音频效果。
原文： 3-D output is mapped into normal left and right stereo panning. At 90 degrees to the left, the sound is coming out of only the left speaker; at 90 degrees to the right, sound is coming out of only the right speaker. The vertical axis is ignored except for scaling of volume due to distance. Doppler shift and volume scaling are still applied, but the 3-D filtering is not performed on this buffer. This is the most efficient software implementation, but provides no virtual 3-D audio effect.

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.DirectSound3DAlgorithmGuid.LightHrt3DAlgorithm
member.summary:
三维API采用高效的三维音频算法进行处理。该算法具有良好的三维音频效果，但使用的CPU周期比guid3dalgorithmhrtffull少。
原文： The 3-D API is processed with the efficient 3-D audio algorithm. This algorithm gives a good 3-D audio effect, but uses fewer CPU cycles than Guid3DAlgorithmHrtfFull

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.DirectSound3DAlgorithmGuid.FullHrt3DAlgorithm
member.summary:
三维API采用高质量的三维音频算法进行处理。此算法提供最高质量的三维音频效果，但使用更多的CPU周期。
原文： The 3-D API is processed with the high quality 3-D audio algorithm. This algorithm gives the highest quality 3-D audio effect, but uses more CPU cycles.

原文： Default 3-D algorithm

member.summary:

member.name: M:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Texture2D.ComputeNormalMap(SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceContext,SlimDX.Direct3D11.Texture2D,SlimDX.Direct3D11.Texture2D,SlimDX.Direct3D11.NormalMapFlags,SlimDX.Direct3D11.Channel,System.Single)
member.summary:
将高度映射转换为普通映射。每个法线的（x，y，z）分量映射到输出纹理的（r，g，b）通道。
原文： Converts a height map into a normal map. The (x,y,z) components of each normal are mapped to the (r,g,b) channels of the output texture.
member.param:
用于创建法线贴图的设备。
原文： The device used to create the normal map.

源高度映射纹理。
原文： The source height map texture.

目标纹理。
原文： The destination texture.

控制正常映射生成的一个或多个标志。
原文： One or more flags that control generation of normal maps.

指定高度信息源的一个或多个标志。
原文： One or more flag specifying the source of height information.

常值乘数，用于增加（或减少）法线贴图中的值。较高的值通常使凹凸更可见，较低的值通常使凹凸不可见。
原文： Constant value multiplier that increases (or decreases) the values in the normal map. Higher values usually make bumps more visible, lower values usually make bumps less visible.
member.returns:
描述操作结果的对象。
原文： A object describing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:SlimDX.Direct3D11.InputAssemblerWrapper.SetVertexBuffers(System.Int32,SlimDX.Direct3D11.VertexBufferBinding[])
member.summary:

原文： Binds an array of vertex buffers to the input assembler.
member.param:
用于绑定的第一个输入槽的索引。第一个顶点缓冲区显式绑定到起始槽；这将导致数组中的每个附加顶点缓冲区隐式绑定到每个后续的输入槽。有16个输入槽。
原文： Index of the first input slot to use for binding. The first vertex buffer is explicitly bound to the start slot; this causes each additional vertex buffer in the array to be implicitly bound to each subsequent input slot. There are 16 input slots.

原文： An array of bindings for input vertex buffers.

原文： A binding for the input vertex buffer.

member.summary:
此设备的硬件辅助声音缓冲支持的最小采样率规范。

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.Capabilities.MaxSecondarySampleRate

此设备的硬件辅助声音缓冲区支持的最大采样率规范。

member.summary:

静态缓冲区的最大数目。

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.Capabilities.MaxHardwareMixingAllBuffers

member.summary:

原文： A set of render target views to bind.

member.name: M:SlimDX.Direct3D11.StreamOutputElement.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
初始化结构的新实例。
原文： Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param:
基于零的流索引。
原文： Zero-based stream index.

输出元素的类型；可能的值包括：“位置”、“正常”或“texcoord0”。注意，如果semanticname为null，那么componentCount可以大于4，并且所描述的条目将是流输出中的一个间隙，在该间隙中不会写入任何数据。
原文： Type of output element; possible values include: "POSITION", "NORMAL", or "TEXCOORD0". Note that if SemanticName is null then ComponentCount can be greater than 4 and the described entry will be a gap in the stream out where no data will be written.

输出元素的从零开始的索引。例如，如果每个顶点中存储了多个纹理坐标，则应使用。
原文： Output element's zero-based index. Should be used if, for example, you have more than one texture coordinate stored in each vertex.

条目的哪个部分开始写入。有效值为0到3。例如，如果只希望输出到位置的y和z组件，那么startcomponent应该是1，componentCount应该是2。
原文： Which component of the entry to begin writing out to. Valid values are 0 to 3. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2.

要写入的项的组件数。有效值为1到4。例如，如果只希望输出到位置的y和z组件，那么startcomponent应该是1，componentCount应该是2。注意，如果semanticname为null，那么componentCount可以大于4，并且所描述的条目将是流输出中的一个间隙，在该间隙中不会写入任何数据。
原文： The number of components of the entry to write out to. Valid values are 1 to 4. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2. Note that if SemanticName is null then ComponentCount can be greater than 4 and the described entry will be a gap in the stream out where no data will be written.

绑定到管道的关联流输出缓冲区。有效值的范围是0到3。
原文： The associated stream output buffer that is bound to the pipeline. Valid values range from 0 to 3.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.StreamOutputElement.OutputSlot
member.summary:
绑定到管道的关联流输出缓冲区。有效值的范围是0到3。
原文： The associated stream output buffer that is bound to the pipeline. Valid values range from 0 to 3.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.StreamOutputElement.ComponentCount
member.summary:
那么startcomponent应该是1，componentCount应该是2。注意，如果semanticname为null，那么componentCount可以大于4，并且所描述的条目将是流输出中的一个间隙，在该间隙中不会写入任何数据。
原文： The number of components of the entry to write out to. Valid values are 1 to 4. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2. Note that if SemanticName is null then ComponentCount can be greater than 4 and the described entry will be a gap in the stream out where no data will be written.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.StreamOutputElement.StartComponent
member.summary:
条目的哪个部分开始写入。有效值为0到3。例如，如果只希望输出到位置的y和z组件，那么startcomponent应该是1，componentCount应该是2。
原文： Which component of the entry to begin writing out to. Valid values are 0 to 3. For example, if you only wish to output to the y and z components of a position, then StartComponent should be 1 and ComponentCount should be 2.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.StreamOutputElement.SemanticIndex
member.summary:
输出元素的从零开始的索引。例如，如果每个顶点中存储了多个纹理坐标，则应使用。
原文： Output element's zero-based index. Should be used if, for example, you have more than one texture coordinate stored in each vertex.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.StreamOutputElement.SemanticName
member.summary:
componentCount可以大于4，并且所描述的条目将是流输出中的一个间隙，在该间隙中不会写入任何数据。
原文： Type of output element; possible values include: "POSITION", "NORMAL", or "TEXCOORD0". Note that if SemanticName is null then ComponentCount can be greater than 4 and the described entry will be a gap in the stream out where no data will be written.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.StreamOutputElement.Stream

原文： Zero-based stream index.

原文： Describes a single element in a vertex buffer in an output slot.

member.name: P:SlimDX.XInput.Vibration.RightMotorSpeed
member.summary:
获取或设置正确的电机速度。
原文： Gets or sets the right motor speed.
member.remarks: Valid values are in the range 0 to 65,535. Zero signifies no motor use; 65,535 signifies 100% motor use.

member.name: P:SlimDX.XInput.Vibration.LeftMotorSpeed
member.summary:
获取或设置左电机速度。
原文： Gets or sets the left motor speed.
member.remarks: Valid values are in the range 0 to 65,535. Zero signifies no motor use; 65,535 signifies 100% motor use.

member.name: T:SlimDX.XInput.Vibration
member.summary:
为控制器的振动功能指定电机速度等级。
原文： Specifies motor speed levels for the vibration function of a controller.
member.remarks: The left motor is the low-frequency rumble motor. The right motor is the high-frequency rumble motor. The two motors are not the same, and they create different vibration effects.

member.name: T:SlimDX.XInput.Gamepad
member.summary:
描述Xbox 360控制器的当前状态。
原文： Describes the current state of the Xbox 360 Controller.
member.remarks: Each of the thumbstick axis members is a signed value between -32768 and 32767 describing the position of the thumbstick. A value of 0 is centered. Negative values signify down or to the left. Positive values signify up or to the right. The constants GamepadLeftThumbDeadZone or GamepadRightThumbDeadZone can be used as a positive and negative value to filter thumbstick input.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.DepthMax
member.summary:
由低频振荡器（LFO）调制延迟时间的最大百分比，以百分之一个百分点为单位。

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.DelayMin
member.summary:
在回放输入之前延迟的最小毫秒数。

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.DelayMax
member.summary:
在回放输入之前延迟的最大毫秒数。

member.summary:
湿（处理）信号与干（未处理）信号之比。默认值为50。

member.summary:
LFO的波形形状。默认情况下，波形是正弦。

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.Phase
member.summary:
左、右低频振荡器之间的相位差。

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.Frequency

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.Feedback

反馈到效果输入的输出信号的百分比。默认值为-50。

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.Depth
member.summary:
通过低频振荡器（LFO）调制延迟时间的百分比，以百分之一个百分点为单位。默认值为100。
原文： Percentage by which the delay time is modulated by the low-frequency oscillator (LFO), in hundredths of a percentage point. The default value is 100.

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect.Delay
member.summary:
在回放输入之前延迟的毫秒数。默认值为2 ms。
原文： Number of milliseconds the input is delayed before it is played back. The default value is 2 ms.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectSound.FlangerEffect

SoundeffectFlanger对象用于在支持法兰的缓冲区上设置和检索效果参数。

member.name: M:SlimDX.DXGI.Surface1.ReleaseDC
member.summary:
释放与当前曲面关联的GDI设备上下文（DC），并允许使用Direct3D进行渲染。
原文： Releases the GDI device context (DC) associated with the current surface and allows rendering using Direct3D.
member.returns:
描述操作结果的对象。
原文： A object describing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:SlimDX.DXGI.Surface1.ReleaseDC(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
释放与当前曲面关联的GDI设备上下文（DC），并允许使用Direct3D进行渲染。
原文： Releases the GDI device context (DC) associated with the current surface and allows rendering using Direct3D.
member.param:
GDI渲染操作了哪些区域。
原文： A pointer to a rectangle that identifies the dirty region of the surface. A dirty region is any part of the surface that you have used for GDI rendering and that you want to preserve. This is used as a performance hint to graphics subsystem in certain scenarios. Do not use this parameter to restrict rendering to the specified rectangular region. The area specified by the rectangle will be used as a performance hint to indicate what areas have been manipulated by GDI rendering.
member.returns:
描述操作结果的对象。
原文： A object describing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:SlimDX.DXGI.Surface1.GetDC(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
返回允许您使用gdi呈现到dxgi图面的设备上下文（dc）。
原文： Returns a device context (DC) that allows you to render to a DXGI surface using GDI.
member.param:
此标志非常适合于简单地读取设备上下文，而不进行任何表面渲染。
原文： If true the application will not preserve any rendering with GDI; otherwise, false. If false, any previous rendering to the device context will be preserved. This flag is ideal for simply reading the device context and not doing any rendering to the surface.
member.returns:
指向HDC句柄的指针，该句柄表示用于GDI呈现的当前设备上下文。
原文： A pointer to an HDC handle that represents the current device context for GDI rendering.

member.name: M:SlimDX.DXGI.Surface1.#ctor(SlimDX.IComObject)
member.summary:
初始化类的新实例。
原文： Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param:

原文： The COM object implementing the IDXGISurface1 interface.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DXGI.Surface1
member.summary:

原文： Extends the standard surface interface to provide GDI interop support.

member.name: M:SlimDX.DirectWrite.TextAnalyzer.AnalyzeBidi(SlimDX.DirectWrite.TextAnalysisSource,System.Int32,System.Int32,SlimDX.DirectWrite.TextAnalysisSink)
member.summary:
从源和报告级别到接收器回调setbidilevel。
原文： Analyzes a text range for script directionality, reading attributes from the source and reporting levels to the sink callback SetBidiLevel.
member.param:
要分析的源对象。
原文： Source object to analyze.

源对象中的起始位置。
原文： Starting position within the source object.

要分析的长度。
原文： Length to analyze.

回调对象。
原文： Callback object.
member.returns:
标准结果错误代码。
原文： 7 Standard Result error code.
member.remarks: While the function can handle multiple paragraphs, the text range should not arbitrarily split the middle of paragraphs. Otherwise the returned levels may be wrong, since the Bidi algorithm is meant to apply to the paragraph as a whole.
Embedded control codes (LRE/LRO/RLE/RLO/PDF) are taken into account.

member.summary:
当释放最后一个对fontfilestream的引用时，资源将关闭。
原文： Creates a font file stream object that encapsulates an open file resource. The resource is closed when the last reference to fontFileStream is released.
member.param:
在正在使用的字体加载器范围内。
原文： Font file reference key that uniquely identifies the font file resource within the scope of the font loader being used.

字体文件引用键的大小（字节）。
原文： Size of font file reference key in bytes.
member.returns:
对新创建的字体文件流的引用。
原文： Reference to the newly created font file stream.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectWrite.IFontFileLoader
member.summary:
作为一个单独的步骤在字体文件加载器实现之外。
原文： Font file loader interface handles loading font file resources of a particular type from a key. The font file loader interface is recommended to be implemented by a singleton object. IMPORTANT: font file loader implementations must not register themselves with DirectWrite factory inside their constructors and must not unregister themselves in their destructors, because registration and underregistration operations increment and decrement the object reference count respectively. Instead, registration and underregistration of font file loaders with DirectWrite factory should be performed outside of the font file loader implementation as a separate step.

member.name: M:SlimDX.DirectWrite.IFontCollectionLoader.CreateEnumeratorFromKey(SlimDX.DirectWrite.Factory,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary:
字体系统调用此接口以创建字体集合。
原文： Creates a font file enumerator object that encapsulates a collection of font files. The font system calls back to this interface to create a font collection.
member.param:
与装载机关联的工厂。
原文： Factory associated with the loader.

正在使用的字体集合加载程序的范围。
原文： Font collection key that uniquely identifies the collection of font files within the scope of the font collection loader being used.

字体集合键的大小（字节）。
原文： Size of the font collection key in bytes.
member.returns:
指向新创建的字体文件枚举器的指针。
原文： Pointer to the newly created font file enumerator.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectWrite.IFontCollectionLoader
member.summary:
作为一个单独的步骤在字体文件加载器实现之外。
原文： The font collection loader interface is used to construct a collection of fonts given a particular type of key. The font collection loader interface is recommended to be implemented by a singleton object. IMPORTANT: font collection loader implementations must not register themselves with a DirectWrite factory inside their constructors and must not unregister themselves in their destructors, because registration and unregistraton operations increment and decrement the object reference count respectively. Instead, registration and unregistration of font file loaders with DirectWrite factory should be performed outside of the font file loader implementation as a separate step.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.MaximumLod
member.summary:
要钳制访问的mipmap范围的上端，其中0是最大和最详细的mipmap级别，任何高于该级别的级别都不太详细。此值必须大于或等于MinimumLod。若要对lod没有上限，请将其设置为较大的值，如float.maxvalue。
原文： Upper end of the mipmap range to clamp access to, where 0 is the largest and most detailed mipmap level and any level higher than that is less detailed. This value must be greater than or equal to MinimumLod. To have no upper limit on LOD set this to a large value such as float.MaxValue.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.MinimumLod
member.summary:
MIPMAP范围的较低端，用于夹取访问，其中0是最大和最详细的MIPMAP级别，任何高于该级别的级别都不太详细。
原文： Lower end of the mipmap range to clamp access to, where 0 is the largest and most detailed mipmap level and any level higher than that is less detailed.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.BorderColor
member.summary:
使用边框寻址模式时使用的边框颜色。
原文： Border color to use if using border addressing mode.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.ComparisonFunction
member.summary:
将采样数据与现有采样数据进行比较的函数。
原文： A function that compares sampled data against existing sampled data.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.MaximumAnisotropy
member.summary:
执行各向异性过滤时使用的夹持值。有效值介于1和16之间。
原文： Clamping value used if performing anisotropic filtering. Valid values are between 1 and 16.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.MipLodBias
member.summary:
与计算的mipmap级别的偏移量。例如，如果Direct3D计算应在mipmap级别3采样纹理，miplodbias为2，则纹理将在mipmap级别5采样。
原文： Offset from the calculated mipmap level. For example, if Direct3D calculates that a texture should be sampled at mipmap level 3 and MipLODBias is 2, then the texture will be sampled at mipmap level 5.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.AddressW
member.summary:
用于解析超出0到1范围的w纹理坐标的方法。
原文： Method to use for resolving a w texture coordinate that is outside the 0 to 1 range.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.AddressV
member.summary:
用于解析0到1范围之外的V纹理坐标的方法。
原文： Method to use for resolving a v texture coordinate that is outside the 0 to 1 range.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.AddressU
member.summary:
用于解析0到1范围之外的U纹理坐标的方法。
原文： Method to use for resolving a u texture coordinate that is outside the 0 to 1 range.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.SamplerDescription.Filter
member.summary:

原文： Filtering method to use when sampling a texture.

原文： Provides a description for sampler state objects.

member.summary:
最低水平为1。
原文： The maximum reordering count of any line of text, used to calculate the most number of hit-testing boxes needed. If the layout has no bidirectional text, or no text at all, the minimum level is 1.

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.TextMetrics.LayoutHeight
member.summary:
高度。
原文： Initial height given to the layout. Depending on the length of the text, it may be larger or smaller than the text content height.

member.summary:
每行末尾的尾随空格。

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.TextMetrics.Width

相对于布局框，同时不包括任何字形悬垂。

原文： Contains the metrics associated with text after layout. All coordinates are in device independent pixels (DIPs).

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.OverhangMetrics.Bottom
member.summary:
对齐边缘。
原文： The distance from the bottom-most visible DIP to its lower alignment edge.

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.OverhangMetrics.Right
member.summary:
对齐边缘。

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.OverhangMetrics.Top

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.OverhangMetrics.Left
member.summary:
对齐边缘。
原文： The distance from the left-most visible DIP to its left alignment edge.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectWrite.OverhangMetrics
member.summary:
合身和暗示。
原文： Indicates how much any visible DIPs (device independent pixels) overshoot each side of the layout or inline objects.
Positive overhangs indicate that the visible area extends outside the layout box or inline object, while negative values mean there is whitespace inside. The returned values are unaffected by rendering transforms or pixel snapping. Additionally, they may not exactly match the final target's pixel bounds after applying grid fitting and hinting.

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.InlineObjectMetrics.SupportsSideways
member.summary:
对于竖排文本。
原文： Flag indicating whether the object is to be placed upright or alongside the text baseline for vertical text.

member.name: P:SlimDX.DirectWrite.InlineObjectMetrics.Baseline
member.summary:
如果基线在底部，基线就等于高度。
原文： Distance from the top of the object to the baseline where it is lined up with the adjacent text. If the baseline is at the bottom, baseline simply equals height.

使用键，释放对共享资源的独占呈现访问权。
原文： Using a key, releases exclusive rendering access to a shared resource.
member.param:
使用相同的值调用keyedmutex.releasesync方法。这个键可以是任意值。
原文： A value that indicates which device to give access to. This method will succeed when the device that currently owns the surface calls the KeyedMutex.ReleaseSync method using the same value. This key can be any arbitrary value.
member.returns:
描述操作结果的对象。
原文： A object describing the result of the operation.

member.name: M:SlimDX.DXGI.KeyedMutex.Acquire(System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary:
使用键，获得对共享资源的独占呈现访问权。
原文： Using a key, acquires exclusive rendering access to a shared resource.
member.param:
使用相同的值调用keyedmutex.release方法。这个键可以是任意值。
原文： A value that indicates which device to give access to. This method will succeed when the device that currently owns the surface calls the KeyedMutex.Release method using the same value. This key can be any arbitrary value.

释放并立即返回。如果将该值设置为最大整数值，则超时间隔将永远不会过去。
原文： The time-out interval, in milliseconds. This method will return if the interval elapses, and the keyed mutex has not been released using the specified key. If this value is set to zero, the Acquire method will test to see if the keyed mutex has been released and returns immediately. If this value is set to the maximum integral value, the time-out interval will never elapse.
member.returns:
描述操作结果的对象。
原文： A object describing the result of the operation.

member.summary:
初始化类的新实例。
原文： Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param:

原文： The COM object implementing the IDXGIKeyedMutex interface.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DXGI.KeyedMutex
member.summary:
表示一个键控的互斥体，它允许对多个设备使用的共享资源进行独占访问。
原文： Represents a keyed mutex, which allows exclusive access to a shared resource that is used by multiple devices.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Direct3D11.RasterizerStateDescription.IsFrontCounterclockwise
member.summary:
确定三角形是正面还是背面。如果此参数为真，则三角形的顶点在渲染目标上为逆时针时将被视为前向，如果为顺时针，则被视为后向。如果该参数为假，则相反为真。
原文： Determines if a triangle is front- or back-facing. If this parameter is true, then a triangle will be considered front-facing if its vertices are counter-clockwise on the render target and considered back-facing if they are clockwise. If this parameter is false then the opposite is true.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectSound.PlayFlags
member.summary:
指定缓冲区的播放行为的标志。
原文： Flags specifying the play behavior of the buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.PlayFlags.TerminateByPriority
member.summary:
过早终止的缓冲区将是由传递给缓冲区的secondarySoundBuffer:：play的priority参数设置的优先级最低的缓冲区。
原文： If the hardware has no available voices, a currently playing buffer will be stopped to make room for the new buffer. The buffer prematurely terminated will be the one with the lowest priority as set by the priority parameter passed to SecondarySoundBuffer::Play for the buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.PlayFlags.TerminateByDistance
member.summary:
将从设置了缓冲区的bufferFlags:：mute3datmaxDistance标志且超出其最大距离的缓冲区中选择提前终止的缓冲区。如果没有这样的缓冲区，方法将失败。
原文： If the hardware has no available voices, a currently playing buffer will be stopped to make room for the new buffer. The buffer prematurely terminated will be selected from buffers that have the buffer's BufferFlags::Mute3DAtMaxDistance flag set and are beyond their maximum distance. If there are no such buffers, the method fails.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.PlayFlags.TerminateByTime
member.summary:
过早终止的缓冲区是剩余时间最少的缓冲区。
原文： If the hardware has no available voices, a currently playing nonlooping buffer will be stopped to make room for the new buffer. The buffer prematurely terminated is the one with the least time left to play.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.PlayFlags.Software

原文： Play this voice in a software buffer only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.SpeakerConfiguration.DirectOut
member.summary:
到频道。
原文： The audio is passed through directly, without being configured for speakers. This specifies a speakerless configuration in which the channels in the playback stream from the application are output directly to the audio adapter without being interpreted as speaker positions. However, the input stream can still be modified by sample-rate conversion, attenuation, filtering, and other types of processing that require no assumptions about the assignment of speakers to channels.

要设置的三维声音处理模式。

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.Mode3D.Disable
member.summary:
3D声音处理被禁用。声音似乎是从听者头部的中心发出的。
原文： Processing of 3D sound is disabled. The sound seems to originate from the center of the listener's head.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.Mode3D.HeadRelative
member.summary:
在这种模式下，随着监听器参数的变化，声音的绝对参数会自动更新，因此相对参数保持不变。
原文： Sound parameters (position, velocity, and orientation) are relative to the listener's parameters. In this mode, the absolute parameters of the sound are updated automatically as the listener's parameters change, so that the relative parameters remain constant.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.Mode3D.Normal
member.summary:
正常处理。这是默认模式。
原文： Normal processing. This is the default mode.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectSound.LockFlags
member.summary:
各种声音缓冲锁定标志。
原文： Various sound buffer locking flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.LockFlags.EntireBuffer
member.summary:
锁定整个缓冲区。
原文： Lock the entire buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.LockFlags.FromWriteCursor
member.summary:
在写入光标处启动锁。
原文： Start the lock at the write cursor.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectSound.CooperativeLevel
member.summary:
指定设备的协作级别的值。
原文： Values specifying the cooperative level of the device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.CooperativeLevel.WritePrimary
member.summary:
设置写入主级别。应用程序对主缓冲区具有写访问权。不能播放辅助缓冲区。
原文： Sets the write-primary level. The application has write access to the primary buffer. No secondary buffers can be played.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.CooperativeLevel.Priority
member.summary:
设置优先级。
原文： Sets the priority level.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.CooperativeLevel.Normal
member.summary:
但由于它不允许更改主缓冲区格式，因此输出被限制为默认的8位格式。
原文： Sets the normal level. This level has the smoothest multitasking and resource-sharing behavior, but because it does not allow the primary buffer format to change, output is restricted to the default 8-bit format.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectSound.CaptureEffectResult
member.summary:
返回捕获效果的值。
原文： Return values for Capture effects.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.CaptureEffectResult.LocatedInSoftware
member.summary:
效果在软件中实例化。
原文： Effect is instantiated in software.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.CaptureEffectResult.LocatedInHardware
member.summary:
效果在硬件中实例化。
原文： Effect is instantiated in hardware.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferStatus
member.summary:
指定缓冲区状态的标志。
原文： Flags specifying the status of the buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferStatus.Terminated
member.summary:
仅为使用bufferFlags:：defer标志创建的缓冲区设置。
原文： The buffer was prematurely terminated by the voice manager and is not playing. Set only for buffers created with the BufferFlags::Defer flag.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferStatus.Software
member.summary:
缓冲区正在软件中播放。仅为使用bufferFlags:：defer标志创建的缓冲区设置。
原文： The buffer is playing in software. Set only for buffers created with the BufferFlags::Defer flag.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferStatus.Hardware
member.summary:
缓冲区正在硬件中播放。仅为使用bufferFlags:：defer标志创建的缓冲区设置。
原文： The buffer is playing in hardware. Set only for buffers created with the BufferFlags::Defer flag.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferStatus.Looping
member.summary:
此值仅与bufferstatus:：playing组合返回。
原文： The buffer is being looped. If this value is not set, the buffer will stop when it reaches the end of the sound data. This value is returned only in combination with BufferStatus::Playing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferStatus.BufferLost
member.summary:
缓冲区丢失，必须还原后才能播放或锁定。
原文： The buffer is lost and must be restored before it can be played or locked.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferStatus.Playing
member.summary:
缓冲区正在播放。如果未设置此值，缓冲区将停止。
原文： The buffer is playing. If this value is not set, the buffer is stopped.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags
member.summary:
指定缓冲区功能的标志。
原文： Flags specifying the capabilities of the buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.Defer
member.summary:
缓冲区可以在播放时分配给硬件或软件资源。
原文： The buffer can be assigned to a hardware or software resource at play time.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.Mute3DAtMaxDistance
member.summary:
仅适用于软件缓冲区。
原文： The sound is reduced to silence at the maximum distance. The buffer will stop playing when the maximum distance is exceeded, so that processor time is not wasted. Applies only to software buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.GetCurrentPosition2
member.summary:
缓冲区在检索当前位置时使用播放光标的新行为。
原文： The buffer uses the new behavior of the play cursor when retrieving the current position.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.GlobalFocus
member.summary:
即使新应用程序使用DirectSound。
原文： The buffer is a global sound buffer. With this flag set, an application using DirectSound can continue to play its buffers if the user switches focus to another application, even if the new application uses DirectSound.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.StickyFocus
member.summary:
但是，如果用户切换到另一个DirectSound应用程序，则缓冲区将被静音。
原文： The buffer has sticky focus. If the user switches to another application not using DirectSound, the buffer is still audible. However, if the user switches to another DirectSound application, the buffer is muted.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.ControlEffects
member.summary:
缓冲区支持效果处理。
原文： The buffer supports effects processing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.ControlPositionNotify
member.summary:
缓冲区具有位置通知功能。
原文： The buffer has position notification capability.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.ControlVolume
member.summary:
缓冲区具有音量控制功能。
原文： The buffer has volume control capability.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.ControlPan
member.summary:
缓冲器具有平移控制能力。
原文： The buffer has pan control capability.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.ControlFrequency
member.summary:
缓冲器具有频率控制能力。
原文： The buffer has frequency control capability.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.Control3D
member.summary:
缓冲器具有三维控制能力。
原文： The buffer has 3D control capability.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.Software
member.summary:
缓冲区在软件存储器中，使用软件混合。
原文： The buffer is in software memory and uses software mixing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.Hardware
member.summary:
缓冲区使用硬件混合。
原文： The buffer uses hardware mixing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.Static
member.summary:
缓冲区在车载硬件存储器中。
原文： The buffer is in on-board hardware memory.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectSound.BufferFlags.PrimaryBuffer
member.summary:
缓冲区是主缓冲区。
原文： The buffer is a primary buffer.

member.name: M:SlimDX.Direct3D11.InputElement.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,SlimDX.DXGI.Format,System.Int32,System.Int32,SlimDX.Direct3D11.InputClassification,System.Int32)
member.summary:
初始化结构的新实例。
原文： Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param:
在明暗器输入签名中与此元素关联的HLSL语义。
原文： The HLSL semantic associated with this element in a shader input-signature.

元素的语义索引。语义索引用整数索引号修改语义。只有在存在多个具有相同语义的元素的情况下才需要语义索引。例如，4x4矩阵将有四个组件，每个组件都带有语义名称矩阵，但是四个组件中的每个组件都具有不同的语义索引（0、1、2和3）。
原文： The semantic index for the element. A semantic index modifies a semantic, with an integer index number. A semantic index is only needed in a case where there is more than one element with the same semantic. For example, a 4x4 matrix would have four components each with the semantic name matrix, however each of the four component would have different semantic indices (0, 1, 2, and 3).

元素数据的数据类型。
原文： The data type of the element data.

每个元素之间的偏移量（字节）。为了方便起见，使用appendAligned直接在前一个元素之后定义当前元素，如有必要，包括任何包装。
原文： Offset (in bytes) between each element. Use AppendAligned for convenience to define the current element directly after the previous one, including any packing if necessary.

标识输入汇编程序的整数值。有效值介于0和15之间。
原文： An integer value that identifies the input-assembler. Valid values are between 0 and 15.

标识单个输入槽的输入数据类。
原文： Identifies the input data class for a single input slot.

在缓冲区中前进一个元素之前，使用相同的每个实例数据绘制的实例数。对于包含逐顶点数据的元素，此值必须为0。
原文： The number of instances to draw using the same per-instance data before advancing in the buffer by one element. This value must be 0 for an element that contains per-vertex data.

member.name: M:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceEx.CheckDeviceState(System.IntPtr)
member.summary:
报告有窗口或全屏应用程序的Direct3D设备的当前协作级别状态。
原文： Reports the current cooperative-level status of the Direct3D device for a windowed or full-screen application.
member.param:
用于检查遮挡的目标窗口句柄。此参数可以是Intptr.Zero
原文： The destination window handle to check for occlusion. This parameter may be IntPtr.Zero
member.returns:
此设备的当前状态。
原文： The current status of this device.
member.remarks: This method replaces the .TestCooperativeLevel function, which always returns .Success in Direct3D 9Ex applications.

member.param:

要打开的包含文件的名称。

父包含文件。
原文： The parent include file.

方法完成后，包含指向包含文件的流。
原文： When the method completes, contains a stream pointing to the include file.

member.name: T:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType
member.summary:
标识使用系统值语义的明暗器参数。
原文： Identifies shader parameters that use system-value semantics.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.FinalLineDensityTessellationFactor
member.summary:
此参数包含与在修补程序中创建的线数量相对应的细分因子。此标志用于细分等值线面片。
原文： This parameter contains the tessellation factor that corresponds to the amount of lines that are created within the patch. This flag is used to tessellate an isolines patch.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.FinalLineDetailTessellationFactor
member.summary:
此参数包含与修补程序中打断的线数量相对应的细分因子。此标志用于细分等值线面片。
原文： This parameter contains the tessellation factor that corresponds to the amount of lines broken into within the patch. This flag is used to tessellate an isolines patch.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.FinalTriangleInsideTessellationFactor
member.summary:
此标志用于细分三面片。
原文： This parameter contains the tessellation factor that corresponds to the amount of parts that a tri patch is broken into within the patch. This flag is used to tessellate a tri patch.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.FinalTriangleEdgeTessellationFactor
member.summary:
沿着给定的边缘。此标志用于细分三面片。
原文： This parameter contains one of three tessellation factors that correspond to the amount of parts that a tri patch is broken into along the given edge. This flag is used to tessellate a tri patch.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.FinalQuadInsideTessellationFactor
member.summary:
在斑块内水平分布。此标志用于细分四元面片。
原文： This parameter contains one of two tessellation factors that correspond to the amount of parts that a quad patch is broken into vertically and horizontally within the patch. This flag is used to tessellate a quad patch.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.FinalQuadEdgeTessellationFactor
member.summary:
给定的边。此标志用于细分四元面片。
原文： his parameter contains one of four tessellation factors that correspond to the amount of parts that a quad patch is broken into along the given edge. This flag is used to tessellate a quad patch.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.DepthLessEqual
member.summary:
此参数表示该值小于或等于参考值。此标志用于指定像素明暗器的保守深度。
原文： This parameter signifies that the value is less than or equal to a reference value. This flag is used to specify conservative depth for a pixel shader.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.SystemValueType.DepthGreaterEqual
member.summary:
此参数表示该值大于或等于参考值。此标志用于指定像素明暗器的保守深度。
原文： This parameter signifies that the value is greater than or equal to a reference value. This flag is used to specify conservative depth for a pixel shader.

member.summary:
用于编码纹理组件的2位值。
原文： A 2-bit value for encoding texture components.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderInputFlags.TextureComponent0
member.summary:
用于编码纹理组件的2位值。
原文： A 2-bit value for encoding texture components.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderInputFlags.ComparisonSampler
member.summary:
使用比较取样器，它使用samplecmp和samplecompletevelzero采样函数。
原文： Use a comparison sampler, which uses the SampleCmp and SampleCmpLevelZero sampling functions.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderInputFlags.UserPacked
member.summary:
根据HLSL代码中的寄存器分配（而不是让编译器选择寄存器），向寄存器分配一个明暗器输入。
原文： Assign a shader input to a register based on the register assignment in the HLSL code (instead of letting the compiler choose the register).

member.name: T:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags
member.summary:
提供各种着色器编译标志。
原文： Provides various shader compilation flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.WarningsAreErrors
member.summary:
选项，这样您就可以解决所有警告并确保尽可能少的难以发现的代码缺陷。
原文： Inform the HLSL compiler to treat all warnings as errors when compiling the shader code. For new shader code, you should use this option so you can resolve all warnings and ensure the fewest possible hard-to-find code defects.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel3
member.summary:
应用程序的最终构建，其中性能是最重要的因素。
原文： Highest optimization level. Will produce best possible code but may take significantly longer to do so. This will be useful for final builds of an application where performance is the most important factor.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel2
member.summary:
第二高优化级别。
原文： Second highest optimization level.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel1
member.summary:
第二个最低优化级别。
原文： Second lowest optimization level.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel0
member.summary:
最低优化级别。可能会生成较慢的代码，但速度更快。这在高度迭代的着色程序开发周期中可能很有用。
原文： Lowest optimization level. May produce slower code but will do so more quickly. This may be useful in a highly iterative shader development cycle.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.EnableIEEEStrictness
member.summary:
启用IEEE浮点严格性。
原文： Enables IEEE floating point strictness.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.EnableBackwardsCompatibility
member.summary:
这使较旧的明暗器能够编译为4_0目标。
原文： This enables older shaders to compile to 4_0 targets.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.EnableStrictness
member.summary:
默认情况下，hlsl编译器禁用不推荐使用的语法的严格性。指定此标志将启用可能不允许旧语法的严格性。
原文： By default, the HLSL compiler disables strictness on deprecated syntax. Specifying this flag enables strictness which may not allow for legacy syntax.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.PreferFlowControl
member.summary:
告诉编译器使用流控制（如果可能）。
原文： Tells the compiler to use flow-control (when possible).

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.AvoidFlowControl
member.summary:
告诉编译器不允许流控制（如果可能）。
原文： Tells the compiler to not allow flow-control (when possible).

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.NoPreshader
member.summary:
禁用预阴影。使用此标志将导致编译器无法提取静态表达式进行计算。
原文： Disables Preshaders. Using this flag will cause the compiler to not pull out static expression for evaluation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.ForceSoftwarePixelShader
member.summary:
为下一个最高的着色程序配置文件编译像素着色程序。此选项打开调试（并关闭优化）。
原文： Compile a pixel shader for the next highest shader profile. This option turns debugging on (and optimizations off).

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.ForceSoftwareVertexShader
member.summary:
为下一个最高的明暗器配置文件编译顶点明暗器。此选项打开调试（并关闭优化）。
原文： Compile a vertex shader for the next highest shader profile. This option turns debugging on (and optimizations off).

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.PartialPrecision
member.summary:
强制以部分精度完成所有计算；这可能在某些硬件上运行得更快。
原文： Force all computations to be done with partial precision; this may run faster on some hardware.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.PackMatrixColumnMajor
member.summary:
更有效，因为它允许使用一系列点积执行向量矩阵乘法。
原文： Unless explicitly specified, matrices will be packed in column-major order on input and output from the shader. This is generally more efficient, since it allows vector-matrix multiplication to be performed using a series of dot-products.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.PackMatrixRowMajor
member.summary:
除非明确指定，否则矩阵将在从明暗器输入和输出时按行主顺序打包。
原文： Unless explicitly specified, matrices will be packed in row-major order on input and output from the shader.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.SkipOptimization
member.summary:
在代码生成期间跳过优化；通常建议仅用于调试。
原文： Skip optimization during code generation; generally recommended for debug only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.SkipValidation
member.summary:
在过去编译的。在将明暗器设置到设备之前，它们始终由DirectX验证。
原文： Do not validate the generated code against known capabilities and constraints. Only use this with shaders that have been successfully compiled in the past. Shaders are always validated by DirectX before they are set to the device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.Debug
member.summary:

原文： Insert debug file/line/type/symbol information into the resulting shader.

member.name: F:SlimDX.D3DCompiler.ShaderFlags.None
member.summary:

原文： No specific compilation options.

原文： Performs a linear interpolation between two quaternions.
member.param:
开始四元数。
原文： Start quaternion.

结束四元数。
原文： End quaternion.

值介于0和1之间，表示的权重。

member.remarks: This method performs the linear interpolation based on the following formula. start + (end - start) * amount Passing a value of 0 will cause to be returned; a value of 1 will cause to be returned.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType
member.summary:
指定直接输入设备的主要类型。
原文： Specifies the main type of a DirectInput device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Supplemental
member.summary:
比如带轮子的踏板。
原文： A specialized device with functionality unsuitable for main control of an application, such as pedals with a wheel.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.ScreenPointer
member.summary:
屏幕指针设备。
原文： A screen pointer device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Remote
member.summary:
一种遥控装置。
原文： A remote-control device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Mouse
member.summary:
鼠标或类似鼠标的设备。
原文： A mouse or mouse-like device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Keyboard
member.summary:
键盘或类似键盘的设备。
原文： A keyboard or keyboard-like device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Joystick
member.summary:
通用操纵杆。
原文： A generic joystick.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Gamepad
member.summary:
一个控制台游戏板。
原文： A console game pad.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Flight
member.summary:
飞行模拟控制器。
原文： Controller for a flight simulation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Driving
member.summary:
一种转向装置。
原文： A device for steering.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.ControlDevice
member.summary:
应用程序。
原文： Input device used to control another type of device from within the context of the application.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.Other
member.summary:
不属于任何其他类别的设备。
原文： A device that does not fall into any other category.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceType.FirstPerson
member.summary:
第一人称动作游戏设备。
原文： A first-person action game device.

member.name: T:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags
member.summary:
指定可与DirectInput设备关联的标志。
原文： Specifies the flags that can be associated with a DirectInput device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.StartDelay
member.summary:
力反馈系统至少支持一个效应的启动延迟参数。
原文： The force-feedback system supports the start delay parameter for at least one effect.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.Saturation
member.summary:
一个条件。
原文： The force-feedback system supports the saturation of condition effects for at least one condition.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.PositiveNegativeSaturation
member.summary:
至少一个条件的力输出。
原文： The force-feedback system supports a maximum saturation for both positive and negative force output for at least one condition.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.PositiveNegativeCoefficients
member.summary:
力反馈系统支持两个条件系数。
原文： The force-feedback system supports two coefficient values for conditions.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.PolledDevice
member.summary:
设备上至少有一个对象被轮询，而不是由中断驱动。
原文： At least one object on the device is polled, rather than interrupt driven.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.PolledDataFormat
member.summary:
当前数据格式中至少有一个对象是轮询的，而不是中断驱动的。
原文： At least one object in the current data format is polled, rather than interrupt driven.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.Phantom
member.summary:
设备是占位符。
原文： The device is a placeholder.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.Hidden
member.summary:
鼠标和键盘事件。
原文： The device is a fictious device created by a device driver so that is can generate mouse and keyboard events.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.ForceFeedbackAttack
member.summary:
力反馈系统至少支持一种效果的攻击参数。
原文： The force-feedback system supports the attack parameter for at least one effect.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.ForceFeedbackFade
member.summary:
力反馈系统至少支持一种效果的衰减参数。
原文： The force-feedback system supports the fade parameter for at least one effect.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.ForceFeedback
member.summary:
该装置支持力反馈。
原文： The device supports force-feedback.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.Emulated
member.summary:
指定设备的数据来自用户模式设备接口。
原文： Specifies that the device's data is coming from a user mode device interface.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.DeadBand
member.summary:
该装置在至少一个力反馈条件下支持死区。
原文： The device supports deadband for at least one force-feedback condition.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.Attached
member.summary:
设备物理连接到用户的计算机。
原文： The device is physically attached to the user's computer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.DirectInput.DeviceFlags.Alias
member.summary:
该设备是另一个DirectInput设备的副本。
原文： The device is a duplicate of another DirectInput device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.NormalMapFlags.ComputeOcclusion
member.summary:
像素不会以任何方式被遮挡，阿尔法为0表示像素完全被遮挡。
原文： Computes the per-pixel occlusion term and encodes it into the alpha. An alpha of 1 means that the pixel is not obscured in any way, and an alpha of 0 means that the pixel is completely obscured.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.NormalMapFlags.InvertSign
member.summary:
反转每个法线的方向。

member.summary:

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags
member.summary:
指示如何在优化操作期间更改网格数据的值。
原文： Values that indicate how to alter mesh data during an optimization operation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags.DeviceIndependent
member.summary:
影响顶点缓存大小。使用此标志指定在旧硬件上工作良好的默认顶点缓存大小。
原文： Affects the vertex cache size. Using this flag specifies a default vertex cache size that works well on legacy hardware.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags.DoNotSplit
member.summary:
属性排序时，不要拆分属性组之间共享的顶点。
原文： While attribute sorting, do not split vertices that are shared between attribute groups.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags.IgnoreVertices
member.summary:
仅优化面；不优化顶点。
原文： Optimize the faces only; do not optimize the vertices.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags.StripReorder
member.summary:
重新排列面以最大化相邻三角形的长度。
原文： Reorders faces to maximize length of adjacent triangles.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags.VertexCache
member.summary:
重新排序面以增加顶点缓存的缓存命中率。
原文： Reorders faces to increase the cache hit rate of vertex caches.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags.AttributeSort
member.summary:
重新排序面以优化以减少属性束状态更改和增强绘制性能。
原文： Reorders faces to optimize for fewer attribute bundle state changes and enhanced draw performance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MeshOptimizeFlags.Compact
member.summary:
重新排序面以删除未使用的顶点和面。
原文： Reorders faces to remove unused vertices and faces.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapFlags.DoNotWait
member.summary:
访问资源。
原文： Do not wait for the resource to become available. The map method will return WasStillRendering when the GPU blocks the CPU from accessing a resource.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapFlags.None
member.summary:
等待资源可用。

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapMode
member.summary:
标识CPU要访问以进行读写的资源。
原文： Identifies a resource to be accessed for reading and writing by the CPU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapMode.WriteNoOverwrite
member.summary:
顶点和索引缓冲区。必须使用写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for writing; the existing contents of the resource cannot be overwritten. This flag is only valid on vertex and index buffers. The resource must have been created with write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapMode.WriteDiscard
member.summary:
资源已映射为要写入；资源的先前内容将未定义。必须使用写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for writing; the previous contents of the resource will be undefined. The resource must have been created with write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapMode.ReadWrite
member.summary:
资源被映射用于读写。必须使用读写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for reading and writing. The resource must have been created with read and write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapMode.Write
member.summary:
资源已映射为要写入。必须使用写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for writing. The resource must have been created with write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.MapMode.Read
member.summary:
资源已映射以供读取。必须使用读取访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for reading. The resource must have been created with read access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ImageFileFormat.Wmp
member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ImageFileFormat.Gif
member.summary:
图形交换格式（GIF）。
原文： Graphics Interchange Format (GIF).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ImageFileFormat.Tiff
member.summary:
标记图像文件格式（TIFF）。
原文： Tagged Image File Format (TIFF).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ImageFileFormat.Dds
member.summary:
mipmap级别，有或没有像素压缩。
原文： DirectDraw surface (DDS) file format. Stores textures, volume textures, and cubic environment maps, with or without mipmap levels, and with or without pixel compression.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ImageFileFormat.Png
member.summary:
可移植网络图形（PNG）文件格式。使用无损压缩的非专有位图格式。
原文： Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file format. A non-proprietary bitmap format using lossless compression.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ImageFileFormat.Jpg
member.summary:
以及8位灰度标记图像文件格式（TIFF）图像文档文件。
原文： Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) compressed file format. Specifies variable compression of 24-bit RGB color and 8-bit gray-scale Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image document files.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ImageFileFormat.Bmp
member.summary:
以及一个位数组，用于定义位图图像中的像素与逻辑调色板中的条目之间的关系。
原文： Windows bitmap (BMP) file format. Contains a header that describes the resolution of the device on which the rectangle of pixels was created, the dimensions of the rectangle, the size of the array of bits, a logical palette, and an array of bits that defines the relationship between pixels in the bitmapped image and entries in the logical palette.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FormatSupport

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FormatSupport.FormatMultisampleLoadSupport
member.summary:
该格式可以用作多采样纹理，并通过hlsl“加载”功能读取到材质球中。
原文： The format can be used as a multisample texture and read into a shader with the HLSL "load" function.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FormatSupport.FormatMultisampleRenderTargetSupport
member.summary:

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags
member.summary:
指定可能的纹理过滤标志。
原文： Specifies possible texture filtering flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.StandardRgb
member.summary:
组合标准rgbin和标准rgbout标志。
原文： Combines the StandardRgbIn and StandardRgbOut flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.StandardRgbOut
member.summary:
输出数据在标准RGB（sRGB）颜色空间中。
原文： Output data is in standard RGB (sRGB) color space.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.StandardRgbIn
member.summary:
输入数据在标准RGB（sRGB）颜色空间中。
原文： Input data is in standard RGB (sRGB) color space.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.DitherDiffusion
member.summary:
从一种格式更改为另一种格式时，对图像执行漫反射抖动。
原文： Do diffuse dithering on the image when changing from one format to another.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.Dither
member.summary:
生成的图像必须使用4x4有序抖动算法进行抖动。从一种格式转换为另一种格式时会发生这种情况。
原文： The resulting image must be dithered using a 4x4 ordered dither algorithm. This happens when converting from one format to another.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.Mirror
member.summary:
组合mirroru、mirrorv和mirrorw标志。
原文： Combines the MirrorU, MirrorV, and MirrorW flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.MirrowW
member.summary:
W轴上纹理边缘的像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the w-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.MirrorV
member.summary:
纹理边缘的V轴像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the v-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.MirrorU
member.summary:
U轴上纹理边缘的像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the u-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.Box
member.summary:
目的地的维度是源的一半，就像mipmap一样。
原文： Each pixel is computed by averaging a 2x2(x2) box of pixels from the source image. This filter works only when the dimensions of the destination are half those of the source, as is the case with mipmaps.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.Triangle
member.summary:
源图像中的每个像素对目标图像的贡献相等。这是最慢的过滤器。
原文： Every pixel in the source image contributes equally to the destination image. This is the slowest of the filters.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.Linear
member.summary:
当两个轴上的比例小于两个时，效果最佳。
原文： Each destination pixel is computed by sampling the four nearest pixels from the source image. This filter works best when the scale on both axes is less than two.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.Point
member.summary:
通过从源图像中采样最近的像素来计算每个目标像素。
原文： Each destination pixel is computed by sampling the nearest pixel from the source image.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FilterFlags.None
member.summary:
不会发生缩放或过滤。源图像边界之外的像素被假定为透明黑色。
原文： No scaling or filtering will take place. Pixels outside the bounds of the source image are assumed to be transparent black.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Filter
member.summary:
指定纹理采样期间使用的过滤选项。
原文： Specifies filtering options used during texture sampling.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Filter.Texture1Bit
member.summary:
用于像素着色，使用R1_Unorm格式的纹理。
原文： For use with pixel shaders utilizing textures in the R1_UNorm format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Filter.ComparisonAnisotropic
member.summary:
使用各向异性插值进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use anisotropic interpolation for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Filter.ComparisonMinMagMipLinear
member.summary:
使用线性插值进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。

member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小和放大；使用点采样进行MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Filter.ComparisonMinLinearMagPointMipLinear
member.summary:

member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小；使用点采样放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。

member.summary:

member.summary:
使用点采样缩小；使用线性插值放大；使用点采样进行MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。

member.summary:
将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use point sampling for minification and magnification; use linear interpolation for mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.summary:
使用点采样进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Filter.MinMagPointMipLinear
member.summary:
使用点采样进行缩小和放大；使用线性插值进行MIP级采样。
原文： Use point sampling for minification and magnification; use linear interpolation for mip-level sampling.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Filter.MinMagMipPoint
member.summary:
使用点采样进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。
原文： Use point sampling for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FillMode
member.summary:
确定渲染三角形时要使用的填充模式。
原文： Determines the fill mode to use when rendering triangles.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FillMode.Solid
member.summary:
填充顶点形成的三角形。不绘制相邻顶点。
原文： Fill the triangles formed by the vertices. Adjacent vertices are not drawn.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.FillMode.Wireframe
member.summary:
绘制连接顶点的线。不绘制相邻顶点。
原文： Draw lines connecting the vertices. Adjacent vertices are not drawn.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.EffectVariableFlags
member.summary:
指定有关Effect变量的详细信息。
原文： Specifies detailed information about Effect variables.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.EffectVariableFlags.ExplicitBindPoint
member.summary:
指示变量已使用效果代码中的register关键字显式绑定。
原文： Indicates the variable has been explicitly bound using the register keyword in the effect code.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.EffectVariableFlags.Pooled
member.summary:
指示变量或常量缓冲区驻留在效果池中。
原文： Indicates that the variable or constant buffer resides in an effect pool.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.EffectVariableFlags.Annotation
member.summary:
指示变量是注释或全局变量。
原文： Indicates that the variable is an annotation or global.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.EffectVariableFlags.None
member.summary:
标准效果变量。
原文： Standard effect variable.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DriverType
member.summary:
指定设备驱动程序类型。
原文： Specifies a device driver type.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DriverType.Warp
member.summary:
一种曲速高性能软件光栅化器。
原文： A WARP high performance software rasterizer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DriverType.Software
member.summary:
保留。不要使用。
原文： Reserved. Do not use.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DriverType.Null
member.summary:
空设备（没有渲染功能的引用设备）。
原文： A null device (a REF device with no rendering capability).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DriverType.Reference
member.summary:
一种软件参考（REF）设备。
原文： A software reference (REF) device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DriverType.Hardware
member.summary:
硬件（HAL）设备。
原文： A hardware (HAL) device.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DeviceCreationFlags
member.summary:
控制设备创建的标志。
原文： Flags controlling the creation of a device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DeviceCreationFlags.PreventThreadingOptimizations
member.summary:
保留。不要使用。
原文： Reserved. Do not use.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DeviceCreationFlags.SwitchToRef
member.summary:
他们之间。
原文： Indicates that both a REF and HAL device should be created, allowing the application to toggle between them.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DeviceCreationFlags.Debug
member.summary:
指示设备应支持调试层。
原文： Indicates that the device should support the debug layer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DeviceCreationFlags.SingleThreaded
member.summary:
线程安全。指定此标志将导致禁用线程安全。
原文： Indicates that a single-threaded device should be created; by default, Direct3D 10 devices are thread-safe. Specifying this flag causes thread-safety to be disabled.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DeviceCreationFlags.None
member.summary:
表示没有特定行为。
原文： Indicates no specific behavior.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthWriteMask
member.summary:
标识用于写入深度模具缓冲区的掩码值。
原文： Identifies mask values for writing to a depth-stencil buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthWriteMask.All
member.summary:
启用对深度模具缓冲区的所有写入。
原文： Enables all writes to the depth-stencil buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthWriteMask.Zero
member.summary:
禁用对深度模具缓冲区的所有写入。
原文： Disables all writes to the depth-stencil buffer.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension
member.summary:
为深度模具资源视图指定了维度（和访问方法）。
原文： Specified the dimension (and access methodology) for depth-stencil resource views.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension.Texture2DMultisampledArray
member.summary:
资源将作为一个支持多采样的二维纹理数组访问。
原文： The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures with multisampling support.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension.Texture2DMultisampled
member.summary:
资源将作为二维纹理访问，并支持多采样。
原文： The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture with multisampling support.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension.Texture2DArray
member.summary:
资源将作为二维纹理数组访问。
原文： The resource will be accessed as an array of 2D textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension.Texture2D
member.summary:
资源将作为二维纹理访问。
原文： The resource will be accessed as a 2D texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension.Texture1DArray
member.summary:
该资源将作为一维纹理数组访问。
原文： The resource will be accessed as an array of 1D textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension.Texture1D
member.summary:
资源将作为一维纹理访问。
原文： The resource will be accessed as a 1D texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilViewDimension.Unknown
member.summary:
在创建视图的过程中。
原文： The resource will be accessed according to its type, determined by the actual resource specified during the creation of the view.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilClearFlags
member.summary:
指定要清除深度模具缓冲区的哪些部分。
原文： Specifies which parts of the depth stencil buffer to clear.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilClearFlags.Stencil
member.summary:
指示应清除模具缓冲区。
原文： Indicates the stencil buffer should be cleared.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DepthStencilClearFlags.Depth
member.summary:
指示应清除深度缓冲区。

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DebugFeatureFlags
member.summary:
控制启用哪些调试功能的标志。
原文： Flags controlling which debug features are enabled.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DebugFeatureFlags.PresentPerRender
member.summary:
Debug.SwapChain和Debug.PresentDelay属性。
原文： The runtime will call SwapChain.Present after the render operation. Presentation of buffers will occur according to the settings specified by the Debug.SwapChain and Debug.PresentDelay properties.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DebugFeatureFlags.FlushPerRender
member.summary:
运行时将在执行呈现操作后调用Device.Flush。
原文： The runtime will call Device.Flush after the render operation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.DebugFeatureFlags.FinishPerRender
member.summary:
应用程序将等待GPU完成呈现操作，然后继续。
原文： The application will wait for the GPU to complete the render operation before continuing.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CullMode
member.summary:
指示未绘制面向特定方向的三角形。
原文： Indicates triangles facing a particular direction are not drawn.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CullMode.Back
member.summary:
剔除背面的三角形。
原文： Cull triangles that are back-facing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CullMode.Front
member.summary:
剔除正面的三角形。
原文： Cull triangles that are front-facing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CullMode.None
member.summary:
不要剔除；所有三角形都会渲染。
原文： Do not cull; all triangles are rendered.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CpuAccessFlags
member.summary:
指定资源允许的CPU访问类型。
原文： Specifies the types of CPU access allowed for a resource.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CpuAccessFlags.Read
member.summary:
CPU上需要读访问。
原文： Read access is required on the CPU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CpuAccessFlags.Write
member.summary:
CPU上需要写访问。
原文： Write access is required on the CPU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CpuAccessFlags.None
member.summary:
CPU上不需要访问。
原文： No access is required on the CPU.

从缓存中读取的Texel数据百分比的计数器。

member.summary:
从缓存中读取的顶点数据百分比的计数器。

member.summary:
像素明暗器用于执行计算的时间百分比的计数器。

member.summary:
像素着色器花费采样资源的时间百分比计数器。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CounterKind.GeometryShaderComputationLimited
member.summary:
几何体明暗器用于执行计算的时间百分比的计数器。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CounterKind.GeometryShaderMemoryLimited
member.summary:
几何体明暗器花费采样资源的时间百分比的计数器。
原文： The counter for the percentage of time the geometry shader spends sampling resources.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CounterKind.VertexShaderComputationLimited
member.summary:
顶点明暗器用于执行计算的时间百分比的计数器。

member.summary:
顶点着色器花费采样资源的时间百分比计数器。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CounterKind.FillRateThroughput
member.summary:
用于填充率的吞吐量百分比计数器。
原文： The counter for the percentage of throughput used for fillrate.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CounterKind.TriangleSetupThroughput
member.summary:
用于三角形设置的吞吐量百分比计数器。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CounterKind.VertexThroughput
member.summary:
顶点吞吐量百分比的计数器。

member.summary:
本地视频内存使用的带宽百分比计数器。

member.summary:
主机适配器上使用的带宽百分比计数器。

member.summary:
GPU执行非顶点、像素或几何图形处理的时间百分比计数器。

GPU处理像素的时间百分比计数器。

member.summary:
GPU处理几何图形的时间百分比计数器。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.CounterKind.Idle

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison
member.summary:
比较选项。
原文： Comparison options.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.Always
member.summary:
测试总是通过的。
原文： The test always passes.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.GreaterEqual
member.summary:
如果（source>=destination），则测试通过。
原文： The test passes if (source >= destination).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.NotEqual
member.summary:
测试通过如果（来源！=目的地）。
原文： The test passes if (source != destination).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.Greater
member.summary:
测试通过if（源>目标）。
原文： The test passes if (source > destination).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.LessEqual
member.summary:
如果（源<=目标），则测试通过。
原文： The test passes if (source <= destination).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.Equal
member.summary:
测试通过if（source==destination）。
原文： The test passes if (source == destination).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.Less
member.summary:
测试通过if（源<目的地）。
原文： The test passes if (source < destination).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Comparison.Never
member.summary:
考试决不及格。
原文： The test never passes.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ColorWriteMaskFlags
member.summary:
标识用于写入呈现目标的掩码值。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ColorWriteMaskFlags.All
member.summary:
指示应启用对所有组件的写入。
原文： Indicates that writes to all components should be enabled.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ColorWriteMaskFlags.Alpha
member.summary:
指示应启用对alpha组件的写入。
原文： Indicates that writes to the alpha component should be enabled.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ColorWriteMaskFlags.Blue
member.summary:
指示应启用对蓝色组件的写入。
原文： Indicates that writes to the blue component should be enabled.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ColorWriteMaskFlags.Green
member.summary:
指示应启用对绿色组件的写入。
原文： Indicates that writes to the green component should be enabled.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.ColorWriteMaskFlags.Red
member.summary:
指示应启用对红色组件的写入。
原文： Indicates that writes to the red component should be enabled.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Channel
member.summary:
以下标志用于指定纹理中要操作的通道。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Channel.Luminance
member.summary:
指示应使用红色、绿色和蓝色通道的亮度。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Channel.Alpha
member.summary:
指示应使用alpha通道。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Channel.Green
member.summary:

原文： Indicates the green channel should be used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Channel.Blue
member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.Channel.Red

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption
member.summary:
混合选项。混合选项标识数据源和可选的预混合操作。
原文： Blend options. A blend option identifies the data source and an optional pre-blend operation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.InverseSecondarySourceAlpha
member.summary:
允许双源混合。
原文： The sources are both alpha (A) outputs from a pixel shader. There is an inverting pre-blend (1 - A). This option allows for dual-source blending.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.SecondarySourceAlpha
member.summary:
允许双源混合。
原文： The sources are both alpha (A) outputs from a pixel shader. There is no pre-blend. This option allows for dual-source blending.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.InverseSecondarySourceColor
member.summary:
允许双源混合。
原文： The sources are both color (RGB) outputs from a pixel shader. There is an inverting pre-blend (1 - RGB). This option allows for dual-source blending.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.SecondarySourceColor
member.summary:
允许双源混合。
原文： The sources are both color (RGB) outputs from a pixel shader. There is no pre-blend operation. This option allows for dual-source blending.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.InverseBlendFactor
member.summary:
源是来自当前混合状态的混合因子（f）和反转预混合（1-f）。
原文： The source is the blend factor (F) from the current blend state with an inverting pre-blend (1 - F).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.BlendFactor
member.summary:
源是当前混合状态的混合因子（f），没有预混合操作。
原文： The source is the blend factor (F) from the current blend state with no pre-blend operation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.SourceAlphaSaturate
member.summary:
源是来自具有饱和度预混合（夹持到1或更少）的渲染目标的alpha（a）。
原文： The source is the alpha (A) from a render target with a saturation pre-blend (clamping to 1 or less).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.InverseDestinationColor
member.summary:
源是来自具有反转预混合（1-a）的renderTarget的颜色（rgb）。
原文： The source is the color (RGB) from a rendertarget with an inverting pre-blend (1 - A).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.DestinationColor
member.summary:
源是来自没有预混合的renderTarget的颜色（rgb）。
原文： The source is the color (RGB) from a rendertarget with no pre-blend.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.InverseDestinationAlpha
member.summary:
源是来自具有反转预混合（1-a）的renderTarget的alpha（a）。
原文： The source is the alpha (A) from a rendertarget with an inverting pre-blend (1 - A).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.DestinationAlpha
member.summary:
源是来自renderTarget的alpha（a），没有预混合。
原文： The source is the alpha (A) from a rendertarget with no pre-blend.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.InverseSourceAlpha
member.summary:
源是来自具有反转预混合（1-a）的像素明暗器的alpha（a）。
原文： The source is the alpha (A) from a pixel shader with an inverting pre-blend (1 - A).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.SourceAlpha
member.summary:
源是来自没有预混合的像素明暗器的alpha（a）。
原文： The source is the alpha (A) from a pixel shader with no pre-blend.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.InverseSourceColor
member.summary:
源是来自具有反转预混合（1-rgb）的像素明暗器的颜色（rgb）。
原文： The source is the color (RGB) from a pixel shader with an inverting pre-blend (1 - RGB).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.SourceColor
member.summary:
源是来自没有预混合的像素明暗器的颜色（RGB）。
原文： The source is the color (RGB) from a pixel shader with no pre-blend.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.One
member.summary:
来源是没有预混合的颜色（1，1，1，1）。
原文： The source is the color (1,1,1,1) with no pre-blend.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOption.Zero
member.summary:
源是没有预混合的颜色（0,0,0,0）。
原文： The source is the color (0,0,0,0) with no pre-blend.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOperation
member.summary:
RGB或Alpha混合操作。
原文： RGB or alpha blending operation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOperation.Maximum
member.summary:
取源值和目标值中的较大值。
原文： Takes the greater of the source and destination values.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOperation.Minimum
member.summary:
取源值和目标值中的较小值。
原文： Takes the lesser of the source and destination values.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOperation.ReverseSubtract
member.summary:
从源中减去目标。
原文： Subtracts the destination from the source.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOperation.Subtract
member.summary:
从目标中减去源。
原文： Subtracts the source from the destination.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BlendOperation.Add
member.summary:
将源添加到目标。
原文： Adds the source to the destination.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BindFlags
member.summary:
标识如何将资源绑定到管道。
原文： Identifies how to bind a resource to the pipeline.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.BindFlags.DepthStencil

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D10.AsynchronousFlags.DoNotFlush
member.summary:
返回成功。
原文： Indicates the command buffer should not be flushed. Note that this can cause an infinite loop if GetData() is called repeatedly until returning successfully: there may still be commands in the buffer than need to be processed in order for GetData() to return successfully. Since the buffer will not be flushed, those commands will not be processed and GetData() will never return successfully.

member.param:
全屏模式设置为真，窗口模式设置为假。

若为空，DxGi将根据交换链的设备和输出窗口的位置选择输出。
原文： If the current display mode is full screen, this parameter must be the output containing the swap chain; otherwise, this parameter is ignored. If you set this parameter to null, DXGI will choose the output based on the swap-chain's device and the output window's placement.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.TextureAddressMode
member.summary:
标识用于解析纹理边界之外的纹理坐标的技术。
原文： Identifies techniques for resolving texture coordinates that are outside of the boundaries of a texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.TextureAddressMode.MirrorOnce
member.summary:
夹紧到最大值。
原文： Similar to Mirror and Clamp. Takes the absolute value of the texture coordinate (thus, mirroring around 0), and then clamps to the maximum value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.TextureAddressMode.Border
member.summary:
超出范围[0.0，1.0]的纹理坐标设置为边框颜色。
原文： Texture coordinates outside the range [0.0, 1.0] are set to the border color.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.TextureAddressMode.Clamp
member.summary:
超出范围[0.0，1.0]的纹理坐标分别设置为纹理颜色0.0或1.0。
原文： Texture coordinates outside the range [0.0, 1.0] are set to the texture color at 0.0 or 1.0, respectively.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.TextureAddressMode.Mirror
member.summary:
在1和2之间，纹理翻转（镜像）;在2和3之间，纹理再次正常;依此类推。
原文： 
        Flip the texture at every (u,v) integer junction. For u values between 0 and 1, for example, the texture is addressed normally;
        between 1 and 2, the texture is flipped (mirrored); between 2 and 3, the texture is normal again; and so on.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.TextureAddressMode.Wrap
member.summary:
在每个（u，v）整数连接处平铺纹理。例如，对于0到3之间的U值，纹理将重复三次。
原文： Tile the texture at every (u,v) integer junction. For example, for u values between 0 and 3, the texture is repeated three times.

原文： Identifies expected resource use during rendering. The usage directly reflects whether a resource is accessible by the CPU and/or the GPU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceUsage.Staging
member.summary:
支持从GPU到CPU的数据传输（拷贝）的资源。
原文： A resource that supports data transfer (copy) from the GPU to the CPU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceUsage.Dynamic
member.summary:
如果数据的布局与资源存储的方式完全相同，请使用deviceContext.updateSubresource，否则请使用map方法。
原文： A resource that is accessible by both the GPU (read only) and the CPU (write only). A dynamic resource is a good choice for a resource that will be updated by the CPU at least once per frame. There are two ways to update a dynamic resource: if your data is laid exactly the way the resource stores it, use DeviceContext.UpdateSubresource, otherwise, use a Map method.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceUsage.Immutable
member.summary:
这种类型的资源必须在创建时初始化，因为创建后不能更改。
原文： A resource that can only be read by the GPU. It cannot be written by the GPU, and cannot be accessed at all by the CPU. This type of resource must be initialized when it is created, since it cannot be changed after creation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceUsage.Default
member.summary:
需要GPU进行读写访问的资源。这可能是最常见的用法选择。
原文： A resource that requires read and write access by the GPU. This is likely to be the most common usage choice.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags
member.summary:
确定其他不太常见的资源选项。
原文： Identifies other, less common options for resources.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.GdiCompatible
member.summary:
呈现与gdi兼容的资源。
原文： Renders a resource compatible with GDI.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.KeyedMutex
member.summary:
将资源启用为键控互斥体。
原文： Enables a resource as a keyed mutex.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.ClampedResource
member.summary:
启用具有固定深度偏移的资源。
原文： Enables a resource with a clamped depth bias.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.StructuredBuffer
member.summary:
将资源启用为结构化缓冲区。
原文： Enables a resource as a structured buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.RawBuffer
member.summary:
将资源启用为字节地址缓冲区。
原文： Enables a resource as a byte address buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.DrawIndirect
member.summary:
启用GPU生成内容的实例。
原文： Enables instancing of GPU-generated content.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.TextureCube
member.summary:
使资源成为从包含6个纹理的纹理darray创建的立方体纹理。
原文： Enables a resource to be a cube texture created from a Texture2DArray that contains 6 textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.Shared
member.summary:
启用两个或多个Direct3D设备之间的资源数据共享。唯一可以共享的资源是二维非mipmapped纹理。
原文： Enables resource data sharing between two or more Direct3D devices. The only resources that can be shared are 2D non-mipmapped textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.GenerateMipMaps
member.summary:
资源是渲染目标和明暗器资源。
原文： Enables mipmap generation on a texture resource. The resource must be created with the bind flags that specify that the resource is a render target and a shader resource.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceOptionFlags.None
member.summary:
未指定其他选项。
原文： No additional options specified.
