member.summary:
标识正在使用的资源类型。
原文： Identifies the type of resource being used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceDimension.Texture3D
member.summary:
资源是三维纹理。
原文： Resource is a 3D texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceDimension.Texture2D

资源是二维纹理。
原文： Resource is a 2D texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceDimension.Texture1D
member.summary:
资源是一维纹理。
原文： Resource is a 1D texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceDimension.Buffer

资源是一个缓冲区。
原文： Resource is a buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ResourceDimension.Unknown
member.summary:
资源的类型未知。
原文： Resource is of unknown type.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ReportingLevel
member.summary:

原文： Options for the amount of information returned about live device objects.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ReportingLevel.Detail
member.summary:
提供设备信息的详细报告。
原文： Gives a detailed report of the device information.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ReportingLevel.Summary
member.summary:
只报告设备信息的摘要。
原文： Reports only a summary of the device information.

member.summary:
资源将以二维纹理的形式进行多采样访问。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.RenderTargetViewDimension.Texture2DArray
member.summary:
资源将作为二维纹理数组访问。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.RenderTargetViewDimension.Texture2D
member.summary:
资源将作为二维纹理访问。

该资源将作为一维纹理数组访问。

member.summary:
资源将作为一维纹理访问。
原文： The resource will be accessed as a 1D texture.

资源将作为缓冲区访问。
原文： The resource will be accessed as a buffer.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType
member.summary:
定义可能的查询类型。
原文： Defines possible query types.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.StreamOutputOverflowPredicate
member.summary:
为了防止溢出，需要大量的内存。
原文： Determines whether or not any of the streaming output buffers overflowed in between DeviceContext.Begin and DeviceContext.End. DeviceContext.GetData returns a boolean; true meaning there was an overflow, and false meaning there was not an overflow. If streaming output writes to multiple buffers, and one of the buffers overflows, then it will stop writing to all the output buffers. When an overflow is detected by Direct3D it is prevented from happening - no memory is corrupted. This predication may be used in conjunction with a StreamOutputStatistics query so that when an overflow occurs the query will let the application know how much memory was needed to prevent an overflow.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.StreamOutputStatistics
member.summary:
deviceContext.getData将返回结构。
原文： Get streaming output statistics, such as the number of primitives streamed out in between DeviceContext.Begin and DeviceContext.End. DeviceContext.GetData will return a structure.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.Predicate
member.summary:
与阻塞查询类似，但deviceContext.getData返回一个布尔值，指示是否传递了任何样本
原文： Similar to an occlusion query, except DeviceContext.GetData returns a boolean indicating whether or not any samples passed

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.PipelineStatistics
member.summary:
deviceContext.getData将返回实例。
原文： Get pipeline statistics, such as the number of pixel shader invocations in between DeviceContext.Begin and DeviceContext.End. DeviceContext.GetData will return a instance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.TimestampDisjoint
member.summary:
这种类型的查询每帧只能调用一次或更少。
原文： Determines whether or not a Timestamp query is returning reliable values, and also gives the frequency of the processor enabling you to convert the number of elapsed ticks into seconds. DeviceContext.GetData will return a instance. This type of query should only be invoked once per frame or less.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.Timestamp
member.summary:
deviceContext.begin已禁用。
原文： Get a timestamp value where DeviceContext.GetData returns a long. This kind of query is only useful if two timestamp queries are done in the middle of a TimestampDisjoint query. The difference of two timestamps can be used to determine how many ticks have elapsed, and the TimestampDisjoint query will determine if that difference is a reliable value and also has a value that shows how to convert the number of ticks into seconds. When using this type of query, DeviceContext.Begin is disabled.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.Occlusion
member.summary:
deviceContext.getData返回一个long。如果深度或模具测试被禁用，则这些测试中的每一个都将被视为通过。
原文： Get the number of samples that passed the depth and stencil tests in between DeviceContext.Begin and DeviceContext.End. DeviceContext.GetData returns a long. If a depth or stencil test is disabled, then each of those tests will be counted as a pass.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryType.Event
member.summary:
使用此类型的查询时，将禁用deviceContext.begin。
原文： Determines whether or not the GPU is finished processing commands. When the GPU is finished processing commands DeviceContext.GetData will return success, and the result will be a boolean with a value of true. When using this type of query, DeviceContext.Begin is disabled.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryFlags
member.summary:
描述选项选项和行为的规格旗帜。
原文： Specifies flags for describing query options and behavior.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryFlags.PredicateHint
member.summary:
使用此标志时通过DeviceContext.GetData。
原文： Tell the hardware that if it is not yet sure if something is hidden or not to draw it anyway. This is only used with an occlusion predicate. Predication data cannot be returned to your application via DeviceContext.GetData when using this flag.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.QueryFlags.None
member.summary:
未指定特定标志。
原文： No particular flags specified.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.PrimitiveTopology.Undefined
member.summary:
IA阶段尚未用原始拓扑初始化。除非定义了原始拓扑，否则IA阶段将无法正常工作。
原文： The IA stage has not been initialized with a primitive topology. The IA stage will not function properly unless a primitive topology is defined.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.NormalMapFlags
member.summary:
法线贴图生成常量。
原文： Normal maps generation constants.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.NormalMapFlags.ComputeOcclusion
member.summary:
像素不会以任何方式被遮挡，阿尔法为0表示像素完全被遮挡。
原文： Computes the per-pixel occlusion term and encodes it into the alpha. An alpha of 1 means that the pixel is not obscured in any way, and an alpha of 0 means that the pixel is completely obscured.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.NormalMapFlags.InvertSign
member.summary:
反转每个法线的方向。
原文： Inverts the direction of each normal.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.NormalMapFlags.Mirror
member.summary:
与指定mirroru和mirrorv标志相同。
原文： Same as specifying the MirrorU and MirrorV flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.NormalMapFlags.MirrorV
member.summary:
指示纹理边缘的V轴像素应镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Indicates that pixels off the edge of the texture on the v-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.NormalMapFlags.MirrorU
member.summary:
指示应镜像u轴上纹理边缘的像素，而不是包裹。
原文： Indicates that pixels off the edge of the texture on the u-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageSeverity
member.summary:
指定信息队列的调试消息严重性级别。
原文： Specifies debug message severity levels for an information queue.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageSeverity.Info
member.summary:
消息包含一般的调试信息。
原文： The message contains generic debug information.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageSeverity.Warning
member.summary:
该消息表示发生了警告。
原文： The message indicates that a warning has occurred.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageSeverity.Error
member.summary:
该消息表示发生了错误。
原文： The message indicates that an error has occurred.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageSeverity.Corruption
member.summary:
该消息表示发生了某种类型的损坏。
原文： The message indicates that some type of corruption has occured.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageCategory
member.summary:
指定各种类型的调试消息。
原文： Specifies various categories of debug messages.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageCategory.Execution
member.summary:
该消息与应用程序执行有关。
原文： The message pertains to application execution.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageCategory.ResourceManipulation
member.summary:
该消息与资源操作有关。
原文： The message pertains to resource manipulation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MessageCategory.StateGetting
member.summary:
这条消息与状态的获取有关。

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapMode
member.summary:
标识CPU可以访问资源的模式。
原文： Identifies modes in which a resource can be accessed by the CPU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapMode.WriteNoOverwrite
member.summary:
顶点和索引缓冲区。必须使用写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for writing; the existing contents of the resource cannot be overwritten. This flag is only valid on vertex and index buffers. The resource must have been created with write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapMode.WriteDiscard
member.summary:
资源已映射为要写入;资源的先前内容将未定义。必须使用写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for writing; the previous contents of the resource will be undefined. The resource must have been created with write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapMode.ReadWrite
member.summary:
资源被映射用于读写。必须使用读写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for reading and writing. The resource must have been created with read and write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapMode.Write
member.summary:
资源已映射为要写入。必须使用写访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for writing. The resource must have been created with write access.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapMode.Read
member.summary:
资源已映射以供读取。必须使用读取访问权限创建资源。
原文： Resource is mapped for reading. The resource must have been created with read access.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapFlags
member.summary:
指定在GPU使用的资源上调用map（）时CPU应如何响应。
原文： Specifies how the CPU should respond when Map() is called on a resource being used by the GPU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapFlags.DoNotWait
member.summary:
访问资源。
原文： Do not wait for the resource to become available. The map method will return WasStillRendering when the GPU blocks the CPU from accessing a resource.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.MapFlags.None
member.summary:
等待资源可用。
原文： Wait for the resource to become available.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.InputClassification
member.summary:
指定输入槽中可能包含的数据类型。
原文： Specifies possible types of data contained in an input slot.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.InputClassification.PerInstanceData
member.summary:
输入数据是每个实例数据。
原文： Input data is per-instance data.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.InputClassification.PerVertexData
member.summary:
输入数据是逐顶点数据。
原文： Input data is per-vertex data.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat
member.summary:
指定运行时支持的图像文件格式。
原文： Specifies image file formats supported by runtime.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat.Wmp
member.summary:
Windows Media Player格式（WMP）。
原文： Windows Media Player format (WMP).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat.Gif
member.summary:
图形交换格式（GIF）。
原文： Graphics Interchange Format (GIF).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat.Tiff
member.summary:
标记图像文件格式（TIFF）。
原文： Tagged Image File Format (TIFF).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat.Dds
member.summary:
mipmap级别，有或没有像素压缩。
原文： DirectDraw surface (DDS) file format. Stores textures, volume textures, and cubic environment maps, with or without mipmap levels, and with or without pixel compression.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat.Png
member.summary:
可移植网络图形（PNG）文件格式。使用无损压缩的非专有位图格式。
原文： Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file format. A non-proprietary bitmap format using lossless compression.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat.Jpg
member.summary:
以及8位灰度标记图像文件格式（TIFF）图像文档文件。
原文： Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) compressed file format. Specifies variable compression of 24-bit RGB color and 8-bit gray-scale Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image document files.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.ImageFileFormat.Bmp
member.summary:
以及一个位数组，用于定义位图图像中的像素与逻辑调色板中的条目之间的关系。
原文： Windows bitmap (BMP) file format. Contains a header that describes the resolution of the device on which the rectangle of pixels was created, the dimensions of the rectangle, the size of the array of bits, a logical palette, and an array of bits that defines the relationship between pixels in the bitmapped image and entries in the logical palette.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport
member.summary:
标识给定格式和给定设备支持哪些资源。
原文： Identifies which resources are supported for a given format and given device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.ShaderGatherComparisonIntrinsic
member.summary:
该格式可用于HLSL“收集”和“比较”功能。
原文： The format can be used with the HLSL "gather" and "compare" functions.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.UnorderedAccessView
member.summary:
该格式可用于无序访问视图。
原文： The format can be used for an unordered access view.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.BackBufferCast
member.summary:
当资源用作后台缓冲区时，该格式支持强制转换。
原文： The format supports casting when the resource is used as a back buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.ShaderGatherIntrinsic
member.summary:
支持内部HLSL“收集”功能。可在Direct3D 10.1或更高版本中使用。
原文： The intrinsic HLSL "gather" function is supported. Available in Direct3D 10.1 or higher.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.FormatMultisampleLoadSupport
member.summary:
该格式可以用作多采样纹理，并通过hlsl“加载”功能读取到材质球中。
原文： The format can be used as a multisample texture and read into a shader with the HLSL "load" function.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.FormatMultisampleRenderTargetSupport
member.summary:
该格式可以用作多采样渲染目标。
原文： The format can be used as a multisample render target.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.FormatCastSupport
member.summary:
格式可以转换为其他格式。
原文： The format can be cast to another format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.FormatDisplaySupport
member.summary:
格式可以显示在屏幕上。
原文： The format can be displayed on screen.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.MultisampleResolve
member.summary:
支持多采样分辨率。
原文： Multisampling resolution is supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.CpuLocking
member.summary:
支持CPU锁定。
原文： CPU locking is supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.DepthStencil
member.summary:
支持深度模具表面。
原文： Depth-stencil surfaces are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.BlendOperation
member.summary:
支持混合操作。
原文： Blend operations are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.RenderTarget
member.summary:
支持renderTargets。
原文： Rendertargets are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.MipMapAutoGeneration
member.summary:
支持自动生成mipmap。
原文： Automatic generation of mipmaps is supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.MipMap
member.summary:
支持mipmap。
原文： Mipmaps are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.ShaderSampleComparisonIntrinsic
member.summary:
支持内部hlsl“samplecmp”和“samplecompletevelzero”。
原文： The intrinsic HLSL "samplecmp" and "samplecmplevelzero" are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.ShaderSampleIntrinsic
member.summary:
支持内部hlsl“sample”函数。
原文： The intrinsic HLSL "sample" function is supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.ShaderLoadIntrinsic
member.summary:
支持内部HLSL“加载”功能。
原文： The intrinsic HLSL "load" function is supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.TextureCube
member.summary:
支持立方体纹理。
原文： Cube textures are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.Texture3D
member.summary:
支持3D纹理。
原文： 3D textures are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.Texture2D
member.summary:
支持二维纹理。
原文： 2D textures are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.Texture1D
member.summary:
支持一维纹理。
原文： 1D textures are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.StreamOutputBuffer
member.summary:
支持流输出缓冲区。
原文： Streaming output buffers are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.IndexBuffer
member.summary:
支持索引缓冲区。
原文： Index buffers are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.VertexBuffer
member.summary:
支持顶点缓冲区。
原文： Vertex buffers are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.Buffer
member.summary:
支持缓冲区资源。
原文： Buffer resources are supported.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FormatSupport.None
member.summary:
不支持任何功能。
原文： No features are supported.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags
member.summary:
指定可能的纹理过滤标志。
原文： Specifies possible texture filtering flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.StandardRgb
member.summary:
组合标准rgbin和标准rgbout标志。
原文： Combines the StandardRgbIn and StandardRgbOut flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.StandardRgbOut
member.summary:
输出数据在标准RGB（sRGB）颜色空间中。
原文： Output data is in standard RGB (sRGB) color space.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.StandardRgbIn
member.summary:
输入数据在标准RGB（sRGB）颜色空间中。
原文： Input data is in standard RGB (sRGB) color space.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.DitherDiffusion
member.summary:
从一种格式更改为另一种格式时，对图像执行漫反射抖动。
原文： Do diffuse dithering on the image when changing from one format to another.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.Dither
member.summary:
生成的图像必须使用4x4有序抖动算法进行抖动。从一种格式转换为另一种格式时会发生这种情况。
原文： The resulting image must be dithered using a 4x4 ordered dither algorithm. This happens when converting from one format to another.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.Mirror
member.summary:
组合mirroru、mirrorv和mirrorw标志。
原文： Combines the MirrorU, MirrorV, and MirrorW flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.MirrowW
member.summary:
W轴上纹理边缘的像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the w-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.MirrorV
member.summary:
纹理边缘的V轴像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the v-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.MirrorU
member.summary:
U轴上纹理边缘的像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the u-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.Box
member.summary:
目的地的维度是源的一半，就像mipmap一样。
原文： Each pixel is computed by averaging a 2x2(x2) box of pixels from the source image. This filter works only when the dimensions of the destination are half those of the source, as is the case with mipmaps.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.Triangle
member.summary:
源图像中的每个像素对目标图像的贡献相等。这是最慢的过滤器。
原文： Every pixel in the source image contributes equally to the destination image. This is the slowest of the filters.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.Linear
member.summary:
当两个轴上的比例小于两个时，效果最佳。
原文： Each destination pixel is computed by sampling the four nearest pixels from the source image. This filter works best when the scale on both axes is less than two.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.Point
member.summary:
通过从源图像中采样最近的像素来计算每个目标像素。
原文： Each destination pixel is computed by sampling the nearest pixel from the source image.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FilterFlags.None
member.summary:
不会发生缩放或过滤。源图像边界之外的像素被假定为透明黑色。
原文： No scaling or filtering will take place. Pixels outside the bounds of the source image are assumed to be transparent black.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter
member.summary:
指定纹理采样期间使用的过滤选项。
原文： Specifies filtering options used during texture sampling.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonAnisotropic
member.summary:
使用各向异性插值进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use anisotropic interpolation for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinMagMipLinear
member.summary:
使用线性插值进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use linear interpolation for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinMagLinearMipPoint
member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小和放大;使用点采样进行MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use linear interpolation for minification and magnification; use point sampling for mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinLinearMagPointMipLinear
member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小;使用点采样放大;使用线性插值进行MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use linear interpolation for minification; use point sampling for magnification; use linear interpolation for mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinLinearMagMipPoint
member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小;使用点采样放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use linear interpolation for minification; use point sampling for magnification and mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinPointMagMipLinear
member.summary:
使用点采样缩小;使用线性插值放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use point sampling for minification; use linear interpolation for magnification and mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinPointMagLinearMipPoint
member.summary:
使用点采样缩小;使用线性插值放大;使用点采样进行MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use point sampling for minification; use linear interpolation for magnification; use point sampling for mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinMagPointMipLinear
member.summary:
将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use point sampling for minification and magnification; use linear interpolation for mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.ComparisonMinMagMipPoint
member.summary:
使用点采样进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。将结果与比较值进行比较。
原文： Use point sampling for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling. Compare the result to the comparison value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.Anisotropic
member.summary:
使用各向异性插值进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。
原文： Use anisotropic interpolation for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.MinMagMipLinear
member.summary:
使用线性插值进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。
原文： Use linear interpolation for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.MinMagLinearMipPoint
member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小和放大;使用点采样进行MIP级采样。
原文： Use linear interpolation for minification and magnification; use point sampling for mip-level sampling.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.MinLinearMagPointMipLinear
member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小;使用点采样放大;使用线性插值进行MIP级采样。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.MinLinearMagMipPoint
member.summary:
使用线性插值缩小;使用点采样放大和MIP级采样。

member.summary:
使用点采样缩小;使用线性插值放大和MIP级采样。

member.summary:
使用点采样缩小;使用线性插值放大;使用点采样进行MIP级采样。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Filter.MinMagPointMipLinear
member.summary:
使用点采样进行缩小和放大;使用线性插值进行MIP级采样。

member.summary:
使用点采样进行缩小、放大和MIP级采样。
原文： Use point sampling for minification, magnification, and mip-level sampling.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FillMode
member.summary:
确定渲染三角形时要使用的填充模式。
原文： Determines the fill mode to use when rendering triangles.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FillMode.Solid
member.summary:
填充顶点形成的三角形。不绘制相邻顶点。
原文： Fill the triangles formed by the vertices. Adjacent vertices are not drawn.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FillMode.Wireframe
member.summary:
绘制连接顶点的线。不绘制相邻顶点。
原文： Draw lines connecting the vertices. Adjacent vertices are not drawn.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FeatureLevel
member.summary:
描述Direct3D设备的目标功能集。
原文： Describes the set of features targeted by a Direct3D device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FeatureLevel.Level_9_3
member.summary:
Direct3D 9.3支持的目标功能，包括材质球着色模型3。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FeatureLevel.Level_9_2
member.summary:
Direct3D 9.2支持的目标功能，包括明暗器明暗器模型2。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FeatureLevel.Level_9_1
member.summary:
Direct3D 9.1支持的目标功能，包括明暗器明暗器模型2。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.FeatureLevel.Level_10_1

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Feature.ComputeShaders
member.summary:
该设备通过shader 4.x支持计算着色器以及原始缓冲区和结构化缓冲区。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Feature.ShaderDoubles
member.summary:
该设备支持在HLSL中使用双精度。
原文： The device supports the use of doubles in HLSL.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.EffectVariableFlags
member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.EffectVariableFlags.ExplicitBindPoint
member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.EffectVariableFlags.Annotation
member.summary:
指示变量是注释或全局变量。
原文： Indicates that the variable is an annotation or global.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.EffectVariableFlags.None
member.summary:

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DriverType
member.summary:
指定可能的驱动程序类型。
原文： Specifies possible driver types.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DriverType.Warp
member.summary:
（9.1级至10.1级），在硬件不可用时采用高性能软件实现。
原文： A WARP driver, which is a high-performance software rasterizer. The rasterizer supports all current feature levels (level 9.1 through level 10.1) with a high performance software implementation when hardware is not available.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DriverType.Software
member.summary:
对于高性能应用程序，由于其性能非常慢。
原文： A software driver, which is a driver implemented completely in software. The software implementation is not intended for a high-performance application due to its very slow performance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DriverType.Null
member.summary:
非呈现API调用，不适用于零售应用程序。此驱动程序由DirectX SDK安装。
原文： A NULL driver, which is a reference driver without render capability. This driver is commonly used for debugging non-rendering API calls, it is not appropriate for retail applications. This driver is installed by the DirectX SDK.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DriverType.Reference
member.summary:
此驱动程序可以称为参考驱动程序、参考驱动程序或参考光栅化器。
原文： A reference driver, which is a software implementation that supports every Direct3D feature. A reference driver is designed for accuracy rather than speed and as a result is slow but accurate. The rasterizer portion of the driver does make use of special CPU instructions whenever it can, but it is not intended for retail applications; use it only for feature testing, demonstration of functionality, debugging, or verifying bugs in other drivers. This driver is installed by the DirectX SDK. This driver may be referred to as a REF driver, a reference driver or a reference rasterizer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DriverType.Hardware
member.summary:
类型通常被称为硬件抽象层或HAL。
原文： A hardware driver, which implements Direct3D features in hardware. This is the primary driver that you should use in your Direct3D applications because it provides the best performance. A hardware driver uses hardware acceleration (on supported hardware) but can also use software for parts of the pipeline that are not supported in hardware. This driver type is often referred to as a hardware abstraction layer or HAL.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DriverType.Unknown
member.summary:
驱动程序类型未知。
原文： The driver type is unknown.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceCreationFlags
member.summary:
描述用于创建设备的参数。
原文： Describes parameters that are used to create a device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceCreationFlags.PreventThreadingOptimizations
member.summary:
阻止创建多个线程。建议不要将此标志用于一般用途。
原文： Prevents multiple threads from being created. This flag is not recommended for general use.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceCreationFlags.Debug
member.summary:
创建支持调试层的设备。
原文： Creates a device that supports the debug layer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceCreationFlags.SingleThreaded
member.summary:
多线程。
原文： Use this flag if an application will only be calling D3D11 from a single thread. If this flag is not specified, the default behavior of D3D11 is to enter a lock during each API call to prevent multiple threads altering internal state. By using this flag no locks will be taken which can slightly increase performance, but could result in undefine behavior if D3D11 is called from multiple threads.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceCreationFlags.None
member.summary:
表示没有特定行为。
原文： Indicates no specific behavior.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceContextType.Deferred

原文： The device context is a deferred context.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.DeviceContextType.Immediate
member.summary:
设备上下文是即时上下文。
原文： The device context is an immediate context.

member.summary:

member.summary:
输入或输出到管道，必须使用临时用途创建。
原文： The resource is to be mappable so that the CPU can read its contents. Resources created with this flag cannot be set as either inputs or outputs to the pipeline and must be created with staging usage.

member.summary:
管道的输出，必须使用动态或分段使用创建。
原文： The resource is to be mappable so that the CPU can change its contents. Resources created with this flag cannot be set as outputs of the pipeline and must be created with either dynamic or staging usage.

member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Comparison.GreaterEqual
member.summary:
如果源数据大于或等于目标数据，则通过比较。

member.summary:
如果源数据不等于目标数据，则通过比较。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Comparison.Greater
member.summary:
如果源数据大于目标数据，则通过比较。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Comparison.LessEqual
member.summary:
如果源数据小于或等于目标数据，则通过比较。

member.summary:
如果源数据等于目标数据，则传递比较。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Comparison.Less
member.summary:
如果源数据小于目标数据，则通过比较。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.Comparison.Never
member.summary:
永远不要通过比较。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.BlendOption.InverseSecondarySourceAlpha
member.summary:
数据源都是来自像素明暗器的alpha数据。预混合操作反转数据，生成1-a。此选项支持双源混合。
原文： The data sources are both alpha data from a pixel shader. The pre-blend operation inverts the data, generating 1 - A. This option supports dual-source blending.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.BlendOption.SecondarySourceAlpha
member.summary:
数据源都是来自像素明暗器的alpha数据。无预混合操作。此选项支持双源混合。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.BlendOption.InverseSecondarySourceColor
member.summary:
数据源都是来自像素明暗器的颜色数据。预混合操作反转数据，生成1-rgb。此选项支持双源混合。
原文： The data sources are both color data from a pixel shader. The pre-blend operation inverts the data, generating 1 - RGB. This option supports dual-source blending.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.BlendOption.SecondarySourceColor
member.summary:
数据源都是来自像素明暗器的颜色数据。无预混合操作。此选项支持双源混合。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.BlendOption.InverseBlendFactor
member.summary:
数据源是在输出合并混合状态下设置的混合因子。预混合操作反转数据，生成1-混合因子。
原文： The data source is the blend factor set in the output-merger blend state. The pre-blend operation inverts the data, generating 1 - blend_factor.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.BlendOption.BlendFactor
member.summary:
数据源是在输出合并混合状态下设置的混合因子。无预混合操作。

member.summary:
数据源是来自像素明暗器的alpha数据。预混合操作将数据限制在1或更少。

member.summary:
数据源是来自像素明暗器的颜色数据。无预混合操作。

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D11.AsynchronousFlags

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D11.AsynchronousFlags.DoNotFlush
member.summary:
返回成功。
原文： Indicates the command buffer should not be flushed. Note that this can cause an infinite loop if GetData() is called repeatedly until returning successfully: there may still be commands in the buffer than need to be processed in order for GetData() to return successfully. Since the buffer will not be flushed, those commands will not be processed and GetData() will never return successfully.

掌握这项技术。

member.name: M:SlimDX.Vector2.DistanceSquared(SlimDX.Vector2,SlimDX.Vector2)
member.summary:
计算两个向量之间的平方距离。
原文： Calculates the squared distance between two vectors.
member.param:
第一个向量。
原文： The first vector.

第二个向量。
原文： The second vector.
member.returns:
两个向量之间的平方距离。
原文： The squared distance between the two vectors.
member.remarks: Distance squared is the value before taking the square root. Distance squared can often be used in place of distance if relative comparisons are being made. For example, consider three points A, B, and C. To determine whether B or C is further from A, compare the distance between A and B to the distance between A and C. Calculating the two distances involves two square roots, which are computationally expensive. However, using distance squared provides the same information and avoids calculating two square roots.

原文： The distance between the two vectors.

member.summary:

原文： Creates a matrix that rotates around an arbitary axis.
member.param:
旋转的轴。
原文： The axis around which to rotate.

以弧度表示的旋转角度。当沿着旋转轴朝向原点时，角度是顺时针测量的。
原文： Angle of rotation in radians. Angles are measured clockwise when looking along the rotation axis toward the origin.

member.name: M:SlimDX.Vector3.DistanceSquared(SlimDX.Vector3,SlimDX.Vector3)
member.summary:
计算两个向量之间的平方距离。
原文： Calculates the squared distance between two vectors.
member.param:
第一个向量。
原文： The first vector.

第二个向量。
原文： The second vector.
member.returns:
两个向量之间的平方距离。
原文： The squared distance between the two vectors.
member.remarks: Distance squared is the value before taking the square root. Distance squared can often be used in place of distance if relative comparisons are being made. For example, consider three points A, B, and C. To determine whether B or C is further from A, compare the distance between A and B to the distance between A and C. Calculating the two distances involves two square roots, which are computationally expensive. However, using distance squared provides the same information and avoids calculating two square roots.

member.summary:

原文： Returns a containing the 3D Cartesian coordinates of a point specified in Barycentric coordinates relative to a 3D triangle.
member.param:
包含三角形顶点1的三维笛卡尔坐标的。
原文： A containing the 3D Cartesian coordinates of vertex 1 of the triangle.

包含三角形顶点2的三维笛卡尔坐标的。
原文： A containing the 3D Cartesian coordinates of vertex 2 of the triangle.

包含三角形顶点3的三维笛卡尔坐标的。
原文： A containing the 3D Cartesian coordinates of vertex 3 of the triangle.

重心坐标b2，表示顶点2的加权因子（在中指定）。
原文： Barycentric coordinate b2, which expresses the weighting factor toward vertex 2 (specified in ).

重心坐标b3，表示顶点3的加权因子（在中指定）。
原文： Barycentric coordinate b3, which expresses the weighting factor toward vertex 3 (specified in ).

方法完成后，包含指定点的三维笛卡尔坐标。
原文： When the method completes, contains the 3D Cartesian coordinates of the specified point.

member.name: M:SlimDX.Vector4.DistanceSquared(SlimDX.Vector4,SlimDX.Vector4)
member.summary:
计算两个向量之间的平方距离。
原文： Calculates the squared distance between two vectors.
member.param:
第一个向量。
原文： The first vector.

第二个向量。
原文： The second vector.
member.returns:
两个向量之间的平方距离。
原文： The squared distance between the two vectors.
member.remarks: Distance squared is the value before taking the square root. Distance squared can often be used in place of distance if relative comparisons are being made. For example, consider three points A, B, and C. To determine whether B or C is further from A, compare the distance between A and B to the distance between A and C. Calculating the two distances involves two square roots, which are computationally expensive. However, using distance squared provides the same information and avoids calculating two square roots.

member.summary:
在两个向量之间执行线性插值。
原文： Performs a linear interpolation between two vectors.
member.param:
起始向量。
原文： Start vector.

结束向量。

原文： When the method completes, contains the linear interpolation of the two vectors.
member.remarks: This method performs the linear interpolation based on the following formula. start + (end - start) * amount Passing a value of 0 will cause to be returned; a value of 1 will cause to be returned.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.VertexDeclaration
member.summary:
应用程序使用VertexDeclaration类的方法来封装顶点明暗器声明。

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.VertexElement
member.summary:
每种数据类型都由一个顶点元素来描述。
原文： Defines the vertex data layout. Each vertex can contain one or more data types, and each data type is described by a vertex element.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.VertexTextureSampler
member.summary:
标识顶点明暗器使用的纹理采样器。
原文： Identifies texture samplers used by vertex shaders.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage
member.summary:
使用状态块还原。
原文： Texture stage states define multi-blender texture operations. Some sampler states set up vertex processing, and some set up pixel processing. Texture stage states can be saved and restored using stateblocks.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.Constant
member.summary:
每级恒定颜色。使用压缩整数颜色设置此状态。
原文： Per-stage constant color. Use packed integer colors to set this state.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.ResultArg
member.summary:
设置此状态。默认值为.current。
原文： Setting to select the destination register for the result of this stage. Use values from to set this state. The default value is .Current.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.AlphaArg0
member.summary:
设置此状态。默认值为.current。
原文： Settings for the third alpha operand for triadic operations. Use values from to set this state. The default value is .Current.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.ColorArg0
member.summary:
设置此状态。默认值为.current。
原文： Settings for the third color operand for triadic operations. Use values from to set this state. The default value is .Current.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.TextureTransformFlags
member.summary:
设置此状态。默认值为.disable。
原文： Specifies transformation options for texture coordinates. Use values from to set this state. The default value is .Disable.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.BumpEnvironmentLOffset
member.summary:
凹凸贴图亮度的浮点偏移值。默认值为0.0f。
原文： Floating-point offset value for bump-map luminance. The default value is 0.0f.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.BumpEnvironmentLScale
member.summary:
凹凸贴图亮度的浮点比例值。默认值为0.0f。
原文： Floating-point scale value for bump-map luminance. The default value is 0.0f.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.TexCoordIndex
member.summary:
坐标在指定索引处，系统默认为U和V坐标（0,0）。
原文： Index of the texture coordinate set to use with this texture stage. You can specify up to eight sets of texture coordinates per vertex. If a vertex does not include a set of texture coordinates at the specified index, the system defaults to the u and v coordinates (0,0).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.BumpEnvironmentMat11
member.summary:
矩阵。默认值为0.0f。
原文： Texture-stage state is a floating-point value for the [1][1] coefficient in a bump-mapping matrix. The default value is 0.0f.

member.summary:
矩阵。默认值为0.0f。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.BumpEnvironmentMat01
member.summary:
矩阵。默认值为0.0f。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.BumpEnvironmentMat00
member.summary:
矩阵。默认值为0.0f。
原文： Texture-stage state is a floating-point value for the [0][0] coefficient in a bump-mapping matrix. The default value is 0.0f.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.AlphaArg2
member.summary:
设置此状态。默认值为.current。
原文： Texture-stage state is the second alpha argument for the stage. Use values from to set this state. The default value is .Current.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureStage.AlphaArg1
member.summary:
设置此状态。默认值为.texture。
原文： Texture-stage state is the first alpha argument for the stage. Use values from to set this state. The default value is .Texture.

member.summary:
对于所有其他阶段，默认值为.disable“/>。
原文： Texture-stage state is a texture alpha blending operation. Use values from to set this state. The default value for the first stage is .SelectArg1; for all other stages the default is .Disable"/>.

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation
member.summary:
定义每个阶段的纹理混合操作。
原文： Defines per-stage texture blending operations.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.Lerp
member.summary:
在第一个源参数中。
原文： Linearly interpolates between the second and third source arguments by a proportion specified in the first source argument.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.MultiplyAdd
member.summary:
然后将它们添加到剩余的输入/源参数中，并将其放入结果中。
原文： Performs a multiply-accumulate operation. It takes the last two arguments, multiplies them together, and adds them to the remaining input/source argument, and places that into the result.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.DotProduct3
member.summary:
将总和复制到所有颜色通道，包括alpha。
原文： Modulate the components of each argument as signed components, add their products; then replicate the sum to all color channels, including alpha.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.BumpEnvironmentMapLuminance
member.summary:
使用下一阶段的环境贴图，使用亮度执行每像素凹凸贴图。
原文： Perform per-pixel bump mapping, using the environment map in the next stage, with luminance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.BumpEnvironmentMap
member.summary:
在下一阶段使用环境映射执行每像素凹凸映射。
原文： Perform per-pixel bump mapping, using the environment map in the next stage.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.ModulateInvColorAddAlpha
member.summary:
调节参数，反转第一个参数，然后添加第一个参数的alpha。
原文： Modulate the arguments, inverting the first argument, then add the alpha of the first argument.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.ModulateInvAlphaAddColor
member.summary:
将结果添加到参数1。
原文： Modulate the color of the second argument, using the inverted alpha from the first argument, and then add the result to argument one.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.ModulateColorAddAlpha
member.summary:
调节参数，然后添加第一个参数的alpha。
原文： Modulate the arguments, then add the alpha of the first argument.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.ModulateAlphaAddColor
member.summary:
将结果添加到参数1。
原文： Modulate the color of the second argument, using the alpha from the first argument, and then add the result to argument one.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.Premodulate
member.summary:
用下一阶段的值预调制参数。
原文： Premodulate the arguments with the next stage's values.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.BlendCurrentAlpha
member.summary:
使用上一阶段的alpha线性混合当前阶段。
原文： Linearly blend the current stage, using the alpha from the previous stage.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.BlendTextureAlphaPM
member.summary:
使用预乘alpha线性混合当前阶段。
原文： Linearly blend the current stage, using a premultiplied alpha.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.BlendFactorAlpha
member.summary:
使用当前纹理因子线性混合当前阶段。
原文： Linearly blend the current stage, using the current texture factor.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.BlendTextureAlpha
member.summary:
使用阶段纹理中的alpha线性混合当前阶段。
原文： Linearly blend the current stage, using the alpha from the stage's texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.BlendDiffuseAlpha
member.summary:
使用每个顶点的插值alpha线性混合当前阶段。
原文： Linearly blend the current stage, using the interpolated alpha from each vertex.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.AddSmooth
member.summary:
添加第一个和第二个参数，然后从和中减去它们的积。
原文： Add the first and second arguments, and then subtract their product from the sum.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.Subtract
member.summary:
从第一个参数的组件中减去第二个参数的组件。
原文： Subtract the components of the second argument from the components of the first argument.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.AddSigned2X
member.summary:
将参数的分量加上-0.5的偏差，然后乘以2。
原文： Add the components of the arguments with a -0.5 bias, and then multiply them by 2.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.AddSigned
member.summary:
添加参数的分量，偏差为-0.5。
原文： Add the components of the arguments with a -0.5 bias.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.Add
member.summary:
添加参数的组件。
原文： Add the components of the arguments.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.Modulate4X
member.summary:
将参数的分量相乘，然后再乘以2。
原文： Multiply the components of the arguments, and then multiply them by 2.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.Modulate2X
member.summary:
将参数的分量相乘，然后再乘以2。
原文： Multiply the components of the arguments, and then multiply them by 2.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.Modulate
member.summary:
将参数的分量相乘。
原文： Multiply the components of the arguments.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.SelectArg2
member.summary:
使用当前阶段的第二个颜色或alpha参数（未修改）作为输出。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureOperation.SelectArg1

使用当前阶段的第一个颜色或alpha参数（未修改）作为输出。

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.summary:
设备支持W基雾。

member.summary:

member.summary:
排序多边形，不需要分配深度缓冲区。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.RasterCaps.MipMapLodBias
member.summary:

member.summary:

member.summary:
设备在照明操作期间计算雾值，并在光栅化期间插入该值。
原文： Device calculates the fog value during the lighting operation and interpolates the value during rasterization.

member.summary:

原文： Device can dither to improve color resolution.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentInterval
member.summary:
指定表示间隔。
原文： Specifies presentation intervals.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentInterval.Four
member.summary:
每次屏幕刷新对当前操作的影响不会超过四次。
原文： Present operations will not be affected more than four times every screen refresh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentInterval.Three
member.summary:
每次屏幕刷新对当前操作的影响不会超过三次。
原文： Present operations will not be affected more than three times every screen refresh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentInterval.Two
member.summary:
每次屏幕刷新对当前操作的影响不会超过两次。
原文： Present operations will not be affected more than twice every screen refresh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentInterval.One
member.summary:
设备将等待垂直回程周期。
原文： The device will wait for the vertical retrace period.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentInterval.Immediate
member.summary:
设备将立即出现，而不等待刷新。
原文： The device will present immediately without waiting for the refresh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentInterval.Default
member.summary:
设备将等待垂直回程周期。
原文： The device will wait for the vertical retrace period.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags
member.summary:
指定可能的表示标志。
原文： Specifies possible presentation flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.RestrictSharedResourceDriver
member.summary:
打开那些共享资源。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Indicates that the driver should restrict access to any shared resources that are created for DWM interaction. The caller must create an authenticated channel with the driver. The driver should then allow access to processes that attempt to open those shared resources. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.RestrictedContent
member.summary:
（DWM）可以使用swapchain。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Indicates that the swapchain contains protected content and automatically causes the runtime to restrict access to the swapchain so that only the Desktop Windows Manager (DWM) can use the swapchain. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.OverlayYCbCr_xvYCC
member.summary:
指示覆盖是扩展的ycbcr（xvycc）。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Indicates that the overlay is extended YCbCr (xvYCC). Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.OverlayYCbCr_BT709
member.summary:
表示覆盖为BT.709，用于高清电视（HDTV）。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Indicates that the overlay is BT.709, for high-definition TV (HDTV). Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.OverlayLimitedRgb
member.summary:
16:16:16是黑色，235:235:235是白色。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Indicates limited range RGB. In limited range RGB, the RGB range is compressed such that 16:16:16 is black and 235:235:235 is white. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.Video
member.summary:
这是对驱动程序的提示，即后缓冲区将包含视频数据。
原文： This is a hint to the driver that the back buffers will contain video data.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.UnprunedMode
member.summary:
允许设备使用无效的显示模式，就像它们是有效的一样。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Allows the device to use invalid display modes as if they were valid. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.NoAutoRotate
member.summary:
指定应用程序将执行自己的显示旋转。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Specifies that the application will perform its own display rotation. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.None
member.summary:
未指定额外的演示文稿标志。
原文： No extra presentation flags specified.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.LockableBackBuffer
member.summary:
设置应用程序何时需要锁定后台缓冲区。
原文： Set when the application requires the ability to lock the back buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.DiscardDepthStencil
member.summary:
每次演示后丢弃深度/模具表面的内容。
原文： Discards the contents of the depth/stencil surface after each presentation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PresentFlags.DeviceClip
member.summary:
将演示文稿剪辑到设备。
原文： Clips the presentation to the device.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present
member.summary:
定义表示调用的标志。
原文： Defines flags for presentation calls.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present.UpdateColorKey
member.summary:
重新绘制颜色键数据。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Redraws the colorkey data. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present.HideOverlay
member.summary:
关闭覆盖硬件。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Turns off the overlay hardware. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present.UpdateOverlayOnly
member.summary:
更改图像显示的持续时间。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Updates the overlay position or the colorkey data without causing an actual flip and without changing the duration with which the image is displayed. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present.ForceImmediate
member.summary:
仅在Windows 7上的Direct3D9ex中可用
原文： PresentInterval.Immediate is enforced on this Present call. This flag can only be specified when using SwapEffect.FlipEx. Windowed and fullscreen presentation behaviors are the same. This is especially useful for media apps that want to discard frames that have been detected as late and present subsequent frames at composition time. An invalid parameter error will be returned if this flag is improperly specified. When multiple consecutive frames with Present.ForceImmediate are queued, only the last frame is displayed, for both windowed and fullscreen presentation. Available in Direct3D9Ex on Windows 7 only

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present.LinearContent
member.summary:
后缓冲区的内容以线性颜色空间呈现。
原文： The content of the backbuffer to be presented is in linear color space.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present.VideoRestrictToMonitor
member.summary:
仅限Direct3D9EX。
原文： Clips the rendered content to the monitor/device that the adapter is targetting. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Present.FlipRestart
member.summary:
仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： The application will discard all previously queued frames and present the current frame next. Available in Direct3D9Ex only.

仅适用于Direct3D9ex。

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Pool
member.summary:
定义保存资源缓冲区的内存类。
原文： Defines the memory class that holds the buffers for a resource.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Pool.Scratch
member.summary:
目标。
原文： Resources are placed in scratch memory. These resources cannot be used as textures or render targets.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Pool.SystemMemory
member.summary:
当设备丢失时不需要重新创建。
原文： Resources are placed in system memory that is not accessable by the device. These resources do not need to be recreated when the device is lost.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Pool.Managed
member.summary:
由系统内存支持，当设备丢失时不需要重新创建。
原文： Resources are copied automatically to device-accessable memory as needed. Managed resources are backed by system memory and do not need to be recreated when the device is lost.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Pool.Default
member.summary:
资源被放置在内存池中，最适合为资源请求的一组用法。
原文： Resources are placed in the memory pool most appropriate for the set of usages requested for the resource.

使用7个样本的全场景多采样级别。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MultisampleType.SixSamples
member.summary:
使用6个样本的全场景多采样级别。
原文： Level of full-scene multisampling using 6 samples.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MultisampleType.FiveSamples
member.summary:
使用5个样本的全场景多采样级别。
原文： Level of full-scene multisampling using 5 samples.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MultisampleType.FourSamples
member.summary:
使用4个样本的全场景多采样级别。
原文： Level of full-scene multisampling using 4 samples.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MultisampleType.ThreeSamples
member.summary:
使用3个样本的全场景多采样级别。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MultisampleType.TwoSamples
member.summary:
使用2个样本的全场景多采样级别。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MultisampleType.NonMaskable
member.summary:
启用多采样质量值。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MultisampleType.None
member.summary:

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags
member.summary:
定义缓冲区锁定标志。
原文： Defines flags for buffer locking.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags.ReadOnly
member.summary:
应用程序不会写入缓冲区。
原文： The application will not write to the buffer.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags.NoSystemLock
member.summary:
防止分配系统范围的资源锁。
原文： Prevents the allocation of a system wide resource lock.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags.NoOverwrite
member.summary:
指示在此锁调用期间不会修改写入的最后一组数据。
原文： Indicates that the last set of data written will not be modified during this lock call.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags.None
member.summary:
未指定锁定标志。
原文： No locking flags specified.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags.NoDirtyUpdate
member.summary:
防止对资源的脏状态进行任何更改。
原文： Prevents any changes to the dirty state of the resource.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags.DoNotWait
member.summary:
如果驱动程序无法立即锁定表面，则允许应用程序返回CPU周期。
原文： Allows the application to gain back CPU cycles if the driver cannot lock the surface immediately.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LockFlags.Discard
member.summary:
应用程序丢弃锁定区域内的所有内存。
原文： The application discards all memory within the locked region.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LineCaps
member.summary:
指定设备的线条绘制功能。
原文： Specifies the line drawing capabilities of a device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LineCaps.Antialias
member.summary:
支持抗锯齿。
原文： Supports antialiasing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LineCaps.Fog
member.summary:
支持雾。
原文： Supports fog.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LineCaps.AlphaCompare
member.summary:
支持阿尔法测试比较。
原文： Supports alpha test comparisons.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LineCaps.Blend
member.summary:
支持源混合。
原文： Supports source-blending.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LineCaps.DepthTest
member.summary:
支持深度测试。
原文： Supports depth test.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LineCaps.Texture
member.summary:
支持纹理映射。
原文： Supports texture-mapping.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LightType
member.summary:
定义可能的灯光类型。
原文： Defines possible light types.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LightType.Directional
member.summary:
光是一种定向光源。这相当于使用无限远的点光源。
原文： Light is a directional light source. This is equivalent to using a point light source at an infinite distance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LightType.Spot
member.summary:
光是聚光灯光源。光照限于圆锥体。
原文： Light is a spotlight source. Illumination is limited to a cone.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.LightType.Point
member.summary:
光是点光源。光在空间中有一个位置，向各个方向辐射。
原文： Light is a point source. The light has a position in space and radiates in all directions.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Issue
member.summary:
为查询问题定义常量。
原文： Defines constants for query issues.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Issue.End
member.summary:
结束查询问题。
原文： End a query issue.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Issue.Begin
member.summary:
开始查询问题。
原文： Start a query issue.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format
member.summary:
定义各种类型的曲面格式。
原文： Defines the various types of surface formats.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.Unknown
member.summary:
未知的表面格式。
原文： Unknown surface format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.ATI_R2VB
member.summary:
用于渲染到顶点缓冲区（r2vb）的曲面格式。
原文： Surface format for Render-To-Vertex-Buffer (R2VB).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.BinaryBuffer
member.summary:
二进制缓冲区格式，指示数据没有固有类型。仅适用于Direct3D9ex。
原文： Binary buffer format indicating that the data has no inherent type. Available for Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A1
member.summary:
1位单色格式。仅适用于Direct3D9ex。
原文： 1-bit monochrome format. Available for Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A4L4
member.summary:
8位格式，每4位用于字母和亮度。
原文： 8-bit format using 4 bits each for alpha and luminance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A8L8
member.summary:
16位格式，每个8位用于字母和亮度。
原文： 16-bit format using 8 bits each for alpha and luminance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.L8
member.summary:
8位亮度。
原文： 8-bit luminance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.L16
member.summary:
16位亮度。
原文： 16-bit luminance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.P8
member.summary:
8位彩色索引。
原文： 8-bit color indexed.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A8P8
member.summary:
用8位字母索引的8位颜色。
原文： 8-bit color indexed with 8 bits of alpha.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A16B16G16R16
member.summary:
64位像素abgr格式，每个通道使用16位。
原文： 64-bit pixel ABGR format using 16 bits for each channel.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.G16R16
member.summary:
32位像素格式，每个像素使用16位表示绿色和红色。
原文： 32-bit pixel format using 16 bits each for green and red.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.X8B8G8R8
member.summary:
32位BGR格式，每个彩色通道使用8位。
原文： 32-bit BGR format using 8 bits for each color channel.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A8B8G8R8
member.summary:
32位ABGR格式，每个通道使用8位。
原文： 32-bit ABGR format using 8 bits for each channel.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A2B10G10R10
member.summary:
32位abgr格式，使用2位表示alpha，10位表示每个颜色分量。
原文： 32-bit ABGR format using 2 bits for alpha and 10 bits for each color component.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.X4R4G4B4
member.summary:
16位RGB格式，每个颜色通道使用4位。
原文： 16-bit RGB format using 4 bits for each color channel.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A8R3G3B2
member.summary:
16位argb格式，使用8位表示字母，3位表示红色和绿色，2位表示蓝色。
原文： 16-bit ARGB format using 8 bits for alpha, 3 bits for red and green, and 2 bits for blue.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A8
member.summary:
8位alpha格式。
原文： 8-bit alpha format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.R3G3B2
member.summary:
8位RGB格式，红色和绿色使用3位，蓝色使用2位。
原文： 8-bit RGB format using 3 bits for red and green and 2 bits for blue.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A4R4G4B4
member.summary:
16位argb格式，每个通道使用4位。
原文： 16-bit ARGB format using 4 bits for each channel.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.R8G8B8
member.summary:
24位RGB格式，每个通道使用8位。
原文： 24-bit RGB format using 8 bits per channel.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.CxV8U8
member.summary:
16位标准压缩格式。
原文： 16-bit normal compression format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.Q16W16V16U16
member.summary:
64位通气映射格式，每个通道使用16位（Q、W、V、U）。
原文： 64-bit bump map format using 16 bits for each channel (Q, W, V, U).

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.V16U16
member.summary:
32位bump map格式，分别为v和u使用16位。
原文： 32-bit bump map format using 16 bits each for V and U.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.Q8W8V8U8
member.summary:
32位通气映射格式，每个通道使用8位（Q、W、V、U）。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.V8U8
member.summary:
16位bump map格式，U和V各使用8位。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.A2W10V10U10
member.summary:
32位bump map格式，其中alpha为2位，w、v和u为10位。

member.summary:
32位bump map格式，每个通道使用8位（亮度，V，U）。

member.summary:
16位bump map格式，亮度为6位，V和U各5位。

member.summary:
128位浮点格式，每个通道使用32位（alpha、blue、green、red）。

member.summary:
64位浮点格式，红色通道使用32位，绿色通道使用32位。

member.summary:
32位浮点格式，红色通道使用32位。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.Yuy2
member.summary:
YY2格式（符合PC98）。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.Uyvy
member.summary:

member.summary:
16位压缩RGB格式，由像素对组成，用于表示颜色。

多元素纹理。

member.summary:
64位浮点格式，每个通道使用16位（alpha、blue、green、red）。

16位浮点格式，红色通道使用16位。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Format.D32

32位Z缓冲区格式，深度为32位。

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps
member.summary:
定义设备的筛选功能。
原文： Defines the filter capabilities of the device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MagGaussianQuad
member.summary:
该设备支持每级高斯四阶滤波放大纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage Gaussian quad filtering for magnifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MagPyramidalQuad
member.summary:
该设备支持每级锥体样本过滤，用于放大纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage pyramidal sample filtering for magnifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MagAnisotropic
member.summary:
该设备支持每级各向异性过滤以放大纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage anisotropic filtering for magnifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MagLinear
member.summary:
该设备支持每级Linaer过滤以放大纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage linaer filtering for magnifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MagPoint
member.summary:
设备支持每级点采样过滤，用于放大纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage point-sample filtering for magnifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MipLinear
member.summary:
设备支持MIPMAP的每级线性过滤。
原文： Device supports per-stage linear filtering for mipmaps.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MipPoint
member.summary:
设备支持MIPMAP的每阶段点采样过滤。
原文： Device supports per-stage point-sample filtering for mipmaps.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MinGaussianQuad
member.summary:
该设备支持每级高斯四次过滤缩小纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage Gaussian quad filtering for minifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MinPyramidalQuad
member.summary:
该设备支持每个阶段的锥形样本过滤，以缩小纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage pyramidal sample filtering for minifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MinAnisotropic
member.summary:
设备支持用于缩小纹理的每阶段各向异性过滤。
原文： Device supports per-stage anisotropic filtering for minifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MinLinear
member.summary:
该设备支持每级线性过滤缩小纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage linear filtering for minifying textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FilterCaps.MinPoint
member.summary:
设备支持每个阶段点的样本过滤，以缩小纹理。
原文： Device supports per-stage point-sample filtering for minifying textures.

member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceType.Software
member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceType.Reference
member.summary:
Direct3D功能在软件中实现。
原文： Direct3D features are implemented in software.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceType.NullReference
member.summary:
在没有硬件或参考光栅化的计算机上初始化Direct3D。
原文： Initialize Direct3D on a computer that has neither hardware nor reference rasterization available.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceType.Hardware
member.summary:
硬件光栅化。
原文： Hardware rasterization.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps
member.summary:
标识设备功能的标志。
原文： Flags identifying the capabilities of the device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.NPatches
member.summary:
设备支持N补丁。
原文： Device supports N-patches.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.RTPatchHandleZero
member.summary:
该设备不需要缓存任何补丁信息。
原文： The device does not require caching of any patch information.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.RTPatches
member.summary:
设备支持矩形和三角形补丁。
原文： Device supports rectangular and triangular patches.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.QuinticRTPatches
member.summary:
该设备支持五次贝塞尔曲线和B样条曲线。
原文： Device supports quintic bezier curves and b-splines.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.PureDevice
member.summary:
该设备可以在硬件中支持光栅化、变换、照明和着色。
原文： Device can support rasterization, transform, lighting, and shading in hardware.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.HWRasterization
member.summary:
该设备具有用于场景光栅化的硬件加速功能。
原文： Device has hardware acceleration for scene rasterization.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.CanBlitSysToNonLocal
member.summary:
设备支持从系统内存纹理到非本地视频内存纹理的点。
原文： Device supports blits from system-memory textures to nonlocal video-memory textures.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.HWTransformAndLight
member.summary:
设备支持硬件改造和照明。
原文： Device can support hardware transformation and lighting.

member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.DeviceCaps.DrawPrimitives2
member.summary:

member.name: F:<unknown type>.UV
member.summary:

原文： Copies out the U and V values at a point on the rectangle or triangle patch.

member.name: F:<unknown type>.CrossUV
member.summary:
用两条切线的叉积计算矩形或三角形面片上某点的法向。
原文： Computes the normal at a point on the rectangle or triangle patch by taking the cross product of the two tangents.

member.name: F:<unknown type>.PartialV
member.summary:
计算V方向矩形或三角形面片上某点的切线。
原文： Computes the tangent at a point on the rectangle or triangle patch in the V direction.

member.summary:
计算U方向矩形或三角形面片上某点的切线。
原文： Computes the tangent at a point on the rectangle or triangle patch in the U direction.

member.name: F:<unknown type>.Default
member.summary:
默认值。细分器按原样复制顶点数据，不进行其他计算。
原文： Default value. The tessellator copies the vertex data as is, with no additional calculations.

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ComposeRectOperation.Copy
member.summary:

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags
member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.SoftwareVertexProcessing
member.summary:
告诉设备使用软件顶点处理。
原文： Tells the device to use software vertex processing.

member.summary:
允许在全屏应用程序期间使用屏幕保护程序。
原文： Allows screensavers during a fullscreen application.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.PureDevice
member.summary:
在状态块中。
原文： Specifies that the device does not support Get* calls for anything that can be stored in state blocks.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.NoWindowChanges
member.summary:
指示Direct3D不能以任何方式更改焦点窗口。
原文： Indicates that Direct3D must not alter the focus window in any way.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.Multithreaded
member.summary:
指示应用程序请求Direct3D具有多线程安全性。
原文： Indicates that the application requests Direct3D to be multithread safe.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.MixedVertexProcessing
member.summary:
告诉设备使用混合顶点处理。
原文： Tells the device to use mixed vertex processing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.HardwareVertexProcessing
member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.FpuPreserve
member.summary:

原文： Preserve the floating point precision used in the calling thread.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.EnablePresentStatistics
member.summary:

原文： Enables the gathering of presentation statistics. Only available in Direct3D9Ex.

member.summary:
将计算限制到主应用程序线程。仅在Windows Vista上可用。
原文： Restrict computation to the main application thread. Only available on Windows Vista.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.DisablePrintScreen
member.summary:
导致运行时不为打印屏幕注册热键。仅在Direct3D9ex中可用。
原文： Causes the runtime to not register hotkeys for print screen. Only available in Direct3D9Ex.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.DisableExtendedDriverManagement
member.summary:
用于视频内存不足等情况。
原文： Direct3D will managed resources instead of the driver. Errors will still be thrown for conditions such as insufficient video memory.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CreateFlags.DisableDriverManagement
member.summary:

原文： Direct3D will managed resources instead of the driver.

member.summary:
如果新像素的值大于当前像素的值，则接受该像素。

member.summary:
如果新像素的值等于当前像素的值，则接受该像素。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Compare.Less
member.summary:
如果新像素的值小于当前像素的值，则接受该像素。

member.summary:

原文： Always fail the test.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.VertexFormatCaps.PointSize
member.summary:
点大小可以来自顶点声明中的点大小数据。
原文： Point size is determined by either the render state or the vertex data. If an FVF is used, point size can come from point size data in the vertex declaration.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.VertexFormatCaps.DoNotStripElements
member.summary:
格式提供更好的性能。
原文： It is preferable that vertex elements not be stripped. That is, if the vertex format contains elements that are not used with the current render states, there is no need to regenerate the vertices. If this capability flag is not present, stripping extraneous elements from the vertex format provides better performance.

member.summary:
混合。
原文： Masks the low WORD of FVFCaps. These bits, cast to the WORD data type, describe the total number of texture coordinate sets that the device can simultaneously use for multiple texture blending.

类似于包装、镜子和夹子的组合。
原文： Similar to a combination of Wrap, Mirror, and Clamp.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureAddress.Border
member.summary:
范围之外的纹理坐标设置为边框颜色。
原文： Texture coordinates outside the range are set to the border color.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureAddress.Clamp
member.summary:
超出范围的纹理坐标被固定为最大值。
原文： Texture coordinates outside the range are clamped to the maximum values.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureAddress.Mirror
member.summary:
纹理在每个整数连接处翻转。
原文： The texture is flipped at every integer junction.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureAddress.Wrap
member.summary:
在每个整数连接处平铺纹理。
原文： Tile the texture at every integer junction.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SwapEffect
member.summary:
定义交换效果。
原文： Defines swap effects.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SwapEffect.FlipEx
member.summary:
翻转模式不影响全屏行为。仅在Windows 7上的Direct3D 9ex中可用。
原文： Designates when an application is adopting flip mode, during which time an application's frame is passed instead of copied to the Desktop Window Manager(DWM) for composition when the application is presenting in windowed mode. Flip mode allows an application to more efficiently use memory bandwidth as well as enabling an application to take advantage of full-screen-present statistics. Flip mode does not affect full-screen behavior. Available in Direct3D 9Ex on Windows 7 only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SwapEffect.Overlay
member.summary:
主曲面中的数据。仅在Windows 7上的Direct3D 9ex中可用。
原文： Use a dedicated area of video memory that can be overlayed on the primary surface. No copy is performed when the overlay is displayed. The overlay operation is performed in hardware, without modifying the data in the primary surface. Available in Direct3D 9Ex on Windows 7 only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SwapEffect.Copy
member.summary:
在后台缓冲区之间复制数据。
原文： Copies the data between back buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SwapEffect.Flip
member.summary:
在多个后缓冲区之间翻转。
原文： Flips between multiple back buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SwapEffect.Discard
member.summary:
在显示后丢弃缓冲区中的数据并呈现目标。
原文： Discards the data in the back buffers and render targets after a presentation.

减小模具值。

member.summary:
增加模具值。

反转模具值。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.StencilOperation.DecrementSaturate

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.StencilOperation.Replace
member.summary:
替换模具值。
原文： Replace the stencil value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.StencilOperation.Zero
member.summary:
将模具值归零。
原文： Zero the stencil value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.StencilOperation.Keep
member.summary:
保留当前模具值。
原文： Keep the current stencil value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureFilter.ConvolutionMono
member.summary:
单色纹理的卷积滤波器。仅适用于Direct3D9ex。
原文： Convolution filter for monochrome textures. Available for Direct3D9Ex only.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureFilter.GaussianQuad
member.summary:
使用4个样本的高斯滤波器。
原文： A 4 sample Guassian filter is used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureFilter.PyramidalQuad
member.summary:
使用4样品帐篷过滤器。
原文： A 4 sample tent filter is used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureFilter.Anisotropic
member.summary:
使用各向异性插值。
原文： Anisotropic interpolation is used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureFilter.Linear
member.summary:
使用双线性插值。
原文： Bilinear interpolation is used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureFilter.Point
member.summary:
使用点过滤。
原文： Point filtering is used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TextureFilter.None
member.summary:
禁用mipmapping。
原文： Mipmapping is disabled.

实例数据。

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.StreamSource.IndexedData
