member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.WeldFlags
member.summary:
指定用于焊接顶点的选项。
原文： Specifies options for welding together vertices.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.WeldFlags.DoNotSplit
member.summary:
指示焊接不拆分单独属性组中的顶点。
原文： Instructs the weld not to split vertices that are in separate attribute groups.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.WeldFlags.DoNotRemoveVertices
member.summary:
但不允许删除顶点。
原文： Instructs the weld to allow only modifications to vertices and not removal. This flag is valid only if WeldPartialMatches is set. It is useful to modify vertices to be equal, but not to allow vertices to be removed.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.WeldFlags.WeldPartialMatches
member.summary:
如果所有组件都相等，请删除其中一个顶点。
原文： If a given vertex component is within epsilon, modify partially matched vertices so that both components are identical. If all components are equal, remove one of the vertices.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.WeldFlags.WeldAll
member.summary:
将位于同一位置的所有顶点焊接在一起。
原文： Weld together all vertices that are at the same location.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TransitionType
member.summary:
定义网格动画值之间的转换样式。
原文： Defines the transition style between values of a mesh animation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TransitionType.EaseInEaseOut
member.summary:
缓和，缓和值之间的样条曲线过渡。
原文： Ease-in, ease-out spline transition between values.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TransitionType.Linear
member.summary:
值之间的线性过渡。
原文： Linear transition between values.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TrackPriority
member.summary:
定义动画轨迹分配到的优先级类型。
原文： Defines the priority type to which an animation track is assigned.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TrackPriority.High
member.summary:
高优先级混合与低优先级混合。
原文： Track should be blended with all the high-priority tracks before the high-priority blend is mixed with the low-priority blend.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TrackPriority.Low
member.summary:
低优先级混合与高优先级混合。
原文： Track should be blended with all the low-priority tracks before the low-priority blend is mixed with the high-priority blend.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions
member.summary:
定义用于网格相切帧计算的设置。
原文： Defines settings used for mesh tangent frame computations.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.GenerateInPlace
member.summary:
结果存储在原始输入网格中，不使用输出网格。
原文： The results are stored in the original input mesh, and the output mesh is not used.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.CalculateNormals
member.summary:
忽略输入网格中已经存在的任何法向量。
原文： Compute the per-vertex normal vector for each triangle of the input mesh, and ignore any normal vectors already in the input mesh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.WindCW
member.summary:
使用逆时针顶点顺序计算的方向。
原文： Vertices are ordered in a clockwise direction around each triangle. The computed normal vector direction is therefore inverted 180 degrees from the direction computed using counterclockwise vertex ordering.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.WeightEqual
member.summary:
与WeightByArea相互排斥。
原文： Compute a unit-length normal vector for each triangle of the input mesh. Mutually exclusive with WeightByArea.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.WeightByArea
member.summary:
连接到该顶点的三角形。相互排斥，权重相等。
原文： Weight the direction of the computed per-vertex normal or partial derivative vector according to the areas of triangles attached to that vertex. Mutually exclusive with WeightEqual.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.OrthogonalizeFromU
member.summary:
关于u的偏导数与dontorthogonalize和正交fromv互斥。
原文： Compute the partial derivative with respect to texture coordinate u independently for each vertex, and then compute the partial derivative with respect to V as the cross product of the normal vector and the partial derivative with respect to U. Mutually exclusive with DontOrthogonalize and OrthogonalizeFromV.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.OrthogonalizeFromV
member.summary:
关于v和法向量。与Dontorthogonalize和OrthonalizeFromu互斥。
原文： Compute the partial derivative with respect to texture coordinate V independently for each vertex, and then compute the partial derivative with respect to U as the cross product of the partial derivative with respect to V and the normal vector. Mutually exclusive with DontOrthogonalize and OrthogonalizeFromU.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.DontOrthogonalize
member.summary:
与正交FromU和正交FromV。
原文： Do not transform texture coordinates to orthogonal Cartesian coordinates. Mutually exclusive with OrthogonalizeFromU and OrthogonalizeFromV.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.DontNormalizePartials
member.summary:
偏导数的长度。
原文： Do not normalize partial derivatives with respect to texture coordinates. If not normalized, the scale of the partial derivatives is proportional to the scale of the 3D model divided by the scale of the triangle in (U, V) space. This scale value provides a measure of how much the texture is stretched in a given direction. The resulting vector length is a weighted sum of the lengths of the partial derivatives.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.WrapUV
member.summary:
将选择最小化三角形周长的坐标集。
原文： Texture coordinate values in both U and V directions are between 0 and 1. In this case a texture coordinate set will be chosen that minimizes the perimeter of the triangle.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.WrapV
member.summary:
将选择最小化三角形周长的坐标集。
原文： Texture coordinate values in the V direction are between 0 and 1. In this case a texture coordinate set will be chosen that minimizes the perimeter of the triangle.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.WrapU
member.summary:
将选择最小化三角形周长的坐标集。
原文： Texture coordinate values in the U direction are between 0 and 1. In this case a texture coordinate set will be chosen that minimizes the perimeter of the triangle.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.TangentOptions.None
member.summary:
没有选择。
原文： No options.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags
member.summary:
用于为sprite.begin方法中的flags参数指定sprite呈现选项的标志。
原文： Flags used to specify sprite rendering options to the flags parameter in the Sprite.Begin method.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.DoNotAddRefTexture
member.summary:
禁止在每个绘图上调用addref（），在flush（）上调用release（）以获得更好的性能。
原文： Disables calling AddRef() on every draw, and Release() on Flush() for better performance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.SortDepthBackToFront
member.summary:
先按深度排序，再按纹理排序。
原文： Sprites are sorted by depth in back-to-front order prior to drawing. This procedure is recommended when drawing transparent sprites of varying depths. You may combine SortDepthBackToFront with SortTexture to sort first by depth, and second by texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.SortDepthFrontToBack
member.summary:
先按深度排序，再按纹理排序。
原文： Sprites are sorted by depth in front-to-back order prior to drawing. This procedure is recommended when drawing opaque sprites of varying depths. You may combine SortDepthFrontToBack with SortTexture to sort first by depth, and second by texture.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.SortTexture
member.summary:
第一，纹理第二。
原文： Sort sprites by texture prior to drawing. This can improve performance when drawing non-overlapping sprites of uniform depth. You may also combine SortTexture with either SortDepthFrontToBack or SortDepthBackToFront. This will sort the list of sprites by depth first and texture second.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.AlphaBlend
member.summary:
调用device.setrenderstate时的混合状态。字体要求在绘制文本时设置此标志。
原文： Enables alpha blending with RenderState.AlphaTestEnable set to true (for nonzero alpha). Blend.SourceAlpha will be the source blend state, and Blend.InverseSourceAlpha will be the destination blend state in calls to Device.SetRenderState. Font expects this flag to be set when drawing text.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.Billboard
member.summary:
必须首先调用sprite.setworldview或sprite.setworldview。
原文： Each sprite will be rotated about its center so that it is facing the viewer. Sprite.SetWorldViewLH or Sprite.SetWorldViewRH must be called first.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.ObjectSpace
member.summary:
变换被修改，以便精灵在屏幕空间坐标中绘制。
原文： The world, view, and projection transforms are not modified. The transforms currently set to the device are used to transform the sprites when the batched sprites are drawn (when Sprite.Flush or Sprite.End is called). If this flag is not specified, then world, view, and projection transforms are modified so that sprites are drawn in screen-space coordinates.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.DoNotModifyRenderState
member.summary:
declarationusage.texcoord和declarationusage.color数据。
原文： The device render state is not to be changed when Sprite.Begin is called. The device is assumed to be in a valid state to draw vertices containing UsageIndex = 0 in the DeclarationUsage.Position, DeclarationUsage.TexCoord, and DeclarationUsage.Color data.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.DoNotSaveState
member.summary:
调用sprite.begin或sprite.end时，设备状态不会被保存或还原。
原文： The device state is not to be saved or restored when Sprite.Begin or Sprite.End is called.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.SpriteFlags.None
member.summary:
没有标志。
原文： No flags.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags
member.summary:
用于分析、编译或组装着色器的标志。
原文： Flags used for parsing, compiling, or assembling shaders.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.UseLegacyD3DX9_31Dll
member.summary:
使用旧版编译器。
原文： Enable the use of the original Direct3D 9 HLSL compiler. OCT2006_d3dx9_31_x86.cab or OCT2006_d3dx9_31_x64.cab must be included as part of the applications redist. This flag is required to compile ps_1_x shaders without using the promotion flag to ps_2_0. Specifying this flag when obtaining an EffectCompiler interface causes subsequent calls to EffectCompiler.CompileEffect and EffectCompiler/CompileShader through this object to use the legacy compiler.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.SkipOptimization
member.summary:
在设置到设备之前，始终由运行时验证。
原文： Do not validate the generated code against known capabilities and constraints. This option is recommended only when compiling shaders that are known to work (that is, shaders that have compiled before without this option). Shaders are always validated by the runtime before they are set to the device.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.SkipValidation
member.summary:
不建议使用此选项的编译器。
原文： Instruct the compiler to skip optimization steps during code generation. Unless you are trying to isolate a problem in your code and you suspect the compiler, using this option is not recommended.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.PreferFlowControl
member.summary:
这是编译器倾向于使用流控制指令的提示。
原文： This is a hint to the compiler to prefer using flow-control instructions.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.PartialPrecision
member.summary:
这可能会导致对某些硬件上的明暗器进行更快的评估。
原文： Force all computations in the resulting shader to occur at partial precision This may result in faster evaluation of shaders on some hardware.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel3
member.summary:
这将有助于应用程序的最终构建，其中性能是最重要的因素。
原文： Highest optimization level. Will produce best possible code but may take significantly longer to do so. This will be useful for final builds of an application where performance is the most important factor.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel2
member.summary:
第二高优化级别。
原文： Second highest optimization level.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel1
member.summary:
第二个最低优化级别。
原文： Second lowest optimization level.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.OptimizationLevel0
member.summary:
这在高度迭代的着色程序开发周期中可能很有用。
原文： Lowest optimization level. May produce slower code but will do so more quickly. This may be useful in a highly iterative shader development cycle.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.NoPreshader
member.summary:
此外，在编译独立函数时，编译器将不会放样任何表达式。
原文： Disables preshaders. The compiler will not pull out static expressions for evaluation on the host CPU. Additionally, the compiler will not loft any expressions when compiling stand-alone functions.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.IeeeStrictness
member.summary:
由于浮点数学中的小精度错误，使用Directx9着色编译器编译的程序。
原文： Disable optimizations that may cause the output of a compiled shader program to differ from the output of a program compiled with the DirectX 9 shader compiler due to small precision erros in floating point math.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.ForceVSSoftwareNoOpt
member.summary:
此标志还关闭优化并打开调试。
原文： Force the compiler to compile against the next highest available software target for vertex shaders. This flag also turns optimizations off and debugging on.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.ForcePSSoftwareNoOpt
member.summary:
此标志还关闭优化并打开调试。
原文： Force the compiler to compile against the next highest available software target for pixel shaders. This flag also turns optimizations off and debugging on.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.EnableBackwardsCompatibility
member.summary:
与更高级别的编译目标一起使用时没有效果。
原文： Compile ps_1_x shaders as ps_2_0. Effects that specify ps_1_x targets will instead compile to ps_2_0 targets because this is the minimum shader version supported by the DirectX 10 shader compiler. This flag has no effect when used with higher level compile targets.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.Debug
member.summary:
在着色器编译期间插入调试文件名、行号以及类型和符号信息。
原文： Insert debug filename, line numbers, and type and symbol information during shader compile.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.AvoidFlowControl
member.summary:
这是编译器避免使用流控制指令的提示。
原文： This is a hint to the compiler to avoid using flow-control instructions.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.PackMatrixRowMajor
member.summary:
行）传递给或从着色器传递时。
原文： Unless explicitly specified, matrices will be packed in row-major order (each vector will be in a single row) when passed to or from the shader.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.PackMatrixColumnMajor
member.summary:
使用一系列点积进行乘法。
原文： Unless explicitly specified, matrices will be packed in column-major order (each vector will be in a single column) when passed to and from the shader. This is generally more efficient because it allows vector-matrix multiplication to be performed using a series of dot products.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ShaderFlags.None
member.summary:
没有标志。
原文： No flags.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.RegisterSet
member.summary:

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PlaybackType
member.summary:
定义用于播放的动画集循环模式的类型。
原文： Defines the type of animation set looping modes used for playback.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PlaybackType.PingPong
member.summary:
动画在向前播放和向后播放之间无休止地交替。
原文： The animation alternates endlessly between playing forward and playing backward.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PlaybackType.Once
member.summary:
动画播放一次，然后在最后一帧停止。
原文： The animation plays once, and then it stops on the last frame.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.PlaybackType.Loop
member.summary:
动画不断重复。
原文： The animation repeats endlessly.

member.summary:

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterType.Int
member.summary:
在写入常量表之前。
原文： Parameter is an integer. Any floating-point values passed into ConstantTable.SetValue, ConstantTable.SetVector, or ConstantTable::SetVectorArray will be rounded off (to zero decimal places) before being written into the constant table.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterType.Bool
member.summary:
在写入常量表之前;否则，常量表中的值将设置为0。
原文： Parameter is a Boolean. Any non-zero value passed into ConstantTable.SetBool, ConstantTable.SetBoolArray, ConstantTable.SetValue, ConstantTable.SetVector, or ConstantTable.SetVectorArray will be mapped to 1 (true) before being written into the constant table; otherwise, the value will be set to 0 in the constant table.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterType.Void
member.summary:
参数是空指针。
原文： Parameter is a void pointer.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterFlags

这些标志提供有关效果参数的其他信息。
原文： These flags provide additional information about effect parameters.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterFlags.Annotation
member.summary:
此参数标记为批注。
原文： This parameter is marked as an annotation.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterFlags.Literal
member.summary:
此参数标记为文本值。
原文： This parameter is marked as a literal value.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterFlags.Shared
member.summary:
更改一个效果中的值将更改所有共享效果中的值。
原文： The value of a parameter will be shared by all effects in the same namespace. Changing the value in one effect will change it in all shared effects.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterFlags.None
member.summary:
此参数未标记。
原文： This parameter is not marked.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterClass.Object
member.summary:
常量是纹理、明暗器或字符串。
原文： Constant is either a texture, shader, or a string.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterClass.MatrixColumns
member.summary:
常量是列主矩阵。
原文： Constant is a column major matrix.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterClass.MatrixRows

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ParameterClass.Vector

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.NormalMapFlags
member.summary:
法线贴图生成常量。
原文： Normal maps generation constants.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.NormalMapFlags.ComputeOcclusion
member.summary:
像素不会以任何方式被遮挡，阿尔法为0表示像素完全被遮挡。
原文： Computes the per-pixel occlusion term and encodes it into the alpha. An alpha of 1 means that the pixel is not obscured in any way, and an alpha of 0 means that the pixel is completely obscured.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.NormalMapFlags.InvertSign
member.summary:
反转每个法线的方向。
原文： Inverts the direction of each normal.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.NormalMapFlags.Mirror
member.summary:
与指定mirroru和mirrorv标志相同。
原文： Same as specifying the MirrorU and MirrorV flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.NormalMapFlags.MirrorV
member.summary:
指示纹理边缘的V轴像素应镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Indicates that pixels off the edge of the texture on the v-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.NormalMapFlags.MirrorU
member.summary:
指示应镜像u轴上纹理边缘的像素，而不是包裹。
原文： Indicates that pixels off the edge of the texture on the u-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshSimplification
member.summary:
指定网格的简化选项。
原文： Specifies simplification options for a mesh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshSimplification.Face
member.summary:
网格将通过minValue参数中指定的面数进行简化。
原文： The mesh will be simplified by the number of faces specified in the MinValue parameter.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshSimplification.Vertex
member.summary:
网格将通过minValue参数中指定的顶点数进行简化。
原文： The mesh will be simplified by the number of vertices specified in the MinValue parameter.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags
member.summary:
指定要执行的网格优化类型。
原文： Specifies the type of mesh optimization to be performed.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags.DeviceIndependent
member.summary:
影响顶点缓存大小。使用此标志指定在旧硬件上工作良好的默认顶点缓存大小。
原文： Affects the vertex cache size. Using this flag specifies a default vertex cache size that works well on legacy hardware.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags.DoNotSplit
member.summary:
属性排序时，不要拆分属性组之间共享的顶点。
原文： While attribute sorting, do not split vertices that are shared between attribute groups.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags.IgnoreVertices
member.summary:
仅优化面;不优化顶点。
原文： Optimize the faces only; do not optimize the vertices.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags.StripReorder
member.summary:
重新排列面以最大化相邻三角形的长度。
原文： Reorders faces to maximize length of adjacent triangles.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags.VertexCache
member.summary:
重新排序面以增加顶点缓存的缓存命中率。
原文： Reorders faces to increase the cache hit rate of vertex caches.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags.AttributeSort
member.summary:
重新排序面以优化以减少属性束状态更改和增强basemesh.drawsubset性能。
原文： Reorders faces to optimize for fewer attribute bundle state changes and enhanced BaseMesh.DrawSubset performance.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshOptimizeFlags.Compact
member.summary:
重新排序面以删除未使用的顶点和面。
原文： Reorders faces to remove unused vertices and faces.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags
member.summary:
用于指定网格创建选项的标志。
原文： Flags used to specify creation options for a mesh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.Software
member.summary:
相当于指定d3dxmesh_vb_软件处理和d3dxmesh_ib_软件处理。
原文： Equivalent to specifying both D3DXMESH_VB_SOFTWAREPROCESSING and D3DXMESH_IB_SOFTWAREPROCESSING.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.Dynamic
member.summary:
相当于指定d3dxmesh_vb_dynamic和d3dxmesh_ib_dynamic。
原文： Equivalent to specifying both D3DXMESH_VB_DYNAMIC and D3DXMESH_IB_DYNAMIC.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.WriteOnly
member.summary:
相当于同时指定VertexBufferDynamic和IndexBufferDynamic。
原文： Equivalent to specifying both VertexBufferDynamic and IndexBufferDynamic.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.Managed
member.summary:
相当于同时指定VertexBufferManaged和IndexBufferManaged。
原文： Equivalent to specifying both VertexBufferManaged and IndexBufferManaged.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.SystemMemory
member.summary:
相当于同时指定VertexBufferSystemMemory和IndexBufferSystemMemory。
原文： Equivalent to specifying both VertexBufferSystemMemory and IndexBufferSystemMemory.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.UseHardwareOnly
member.summary:
使用硬件（如果硬件支持）或将默认为软件处理。
原文： Use hardware processing only. For mixed-mode device, this flag will cause the system to use hardware (if supported in hardware) or will default to software processing.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.VertexBufferShare
member.summary:
强制克隆的网格共享顶点缓冲区。
原文： Forces the cloned meshes to share vertex buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.IndexBufferSoftware
member.summary:
对索引缓冲区使用SoftwareProcessing使用标志。
原文： Use the SoftwareProcessing usage flag for index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.IndexBufferDynamic
member.summary:
对索引缓冲区使用动态使用标志。
原文： Use the Dynamic usage flag for index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.IndexBufferWriteOnly
member.summary:
对索引缓冲区使用writeOnly使用标志。
原文： Use the WriteOnly usage flag for index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.IndexBufferManaged
member.summary:
对索引缓冲区使用托管使用标志。
原文： Use the Managed usage flag for index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.IndexBufferSystemMemory
member.summary:
使用索引缓冲区的系统内存使用标志。
原文： Use the SystemMemory usage flag for index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.VertexBufferSoftware
member.summary:
使用顶点缓冲区的软件处理使用标志。
原文： Use the SoftwareProcessing usage flag for vertex buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.VertexBufferDynamic
member.summary:
使用顶点缓冲区的动态使用标志。
原文： Use the Dynamic usage flag for vertex buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.VertexBufferWriteOnly
member.summary:
对顶点缓冲区使用只写使用标志。
原文： Use the WriteOnly usage flag for vertex buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.VertexBufferManaged
member.summary:
对顶点缓冲区使用托管使用标志。
原文： Use the Managed usage flag for vertex buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.VertexBufferSystemMemory
member.summary:
使用顶点缓冲区的系统内存使用标志。
原文： Use the SystemMemory usage flag for vertex buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.NPatches
member.summary:
标志。如果要使用Direct3D的n-patch增强渲染网格对象，则需要执行此操作。
原文： Specifying this flag causes the vertex and index buffer of the mesh to be created with the NPatches flag. This is required if the mesh object is to be rendered using N-patch enhancement using Direct3D.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.RTPatches
member.summary:
对顶点和索引缓冲区使用rtpatches使用标志。
原文： Use the RTPatches usage flag for vertex and index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.Points
member.summary:
使用顶点和索引缓冲区的点使用标志。
原文： Use the Points usage flag for vertex and index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.DoNotClip
member.summary:
对顶点和索引缓冲区使用donotclip使用标志。
原文： Use the DoNotClip usage flag for vertex and index buffers.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshFlags.Use32Bit
member.summary:
网格有32位索引，而不是16位索引。
原文： The mesh has 32-bit indices instead of 16-bit indices.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshDataType
member.summary:
定义网格数据中存在的网格数据类型。
原文： Defines the type of mesh data present in MeshData.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshDataType.PatchMesh
member.summary:
数据类型为面片网格。请参见PatchMesh。
原文： The data type is a patch mesh. See PatchMesh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshDataType.ProgressiveMesh
member.summary:
数据类型是渐进式网格。请参见渐进式网格。
原文： The data type is a progressive mesh. See ProgressiveMesh.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.MeshDataType.Mesh
member.summary:
数据类型是网格。请参见网格。
原文： The data type is a mesh. See Mesh.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.IncludeType
member.summary:
描述包含文件的位置。
原文： Describes the location for the include file.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.IncludeType.System
member.summary:
在系统路径中查找包含文件。
原文： Look in the system path for the include file.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.IncludeType.Local
member.summary:
在本地项目中查找包含文件。
原文： Look in the local project for the include file.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat
member.summary:
描述支持的图像文件格式。
原文： Describes the supported image file formats.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Pfm
member.summary:
可移植的浮动映射文件格式。
原文： Portable float map file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Hdr
member.summary:
高动态范围（HDR）文件格式。
原文： High dynamic range (HDR) file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Dib
member.summary:
Windows设备独立位图（DIB）文件格式。
原文： Windows device-independent bitmap (DIB) file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Ppm
member.summary:
便携式PixMap（PPM）文件格式。
原文： Portable pixmap (PPM) file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Dds
member.summary:
DirectDraw Surface（DDS）文件格式。
原文： DirectDraw surface (DDS) file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Png
member.summary:
可移植网络图形（PNG）文件格式。
原文： Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Tga
member.summary:
Truevision（Targa或TGA）图像文件格式。
原文： Truevision (Targa, or TGA) image file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Jpg
member.summary:
联合摄影专家组（jpeg）压缩文件格式。
原文： Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) compressed file format.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.ImageFileFormat.Bmp
member.summary:
Windows位图（BMP）文件格式。
原文： Windows bitmap (BMP) file format.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FX
member.summary:
保存和创建效果的选项。
原文： Options for saving and creating effects.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FX.DoNotSaveSamplerState
member.summary:
调用effect.begin并在调用effect.end时还原状态。
原文： A stateblock saves state (except shaders and shader constants) when calling Effect.Begin and restores state when calling Effect.End.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FX.DoNotSaveShaderState
member.summary:
状态块在调用effect.begin时保存状态，并在调用effect.end时还原状态。
原文： A stateblock saves state when calling Effect.Begin and restores state when calling Effect.End.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FX.DoNotSaveState
member.summary:
调用effect时不保存任何状态。调用effect.end时开始或还原。
原文： No state is saved when calling Effect.Begin or restored when calling Effect.End.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.FX.None
member.summary:
没有标志。
原文： No flags.

member.name: T:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter
member.summary:
用于指定处理图像时要使用的筛选器的标志。
原文： Flags used to specify what filters to use when processing an image.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.SrgbOut
member.summary:
输出数据以sRGB（gamma 2.2）颜色空间为单位。
原文： The output data is in sRGB (gamma 2.2) color space.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.SrgbIn
member.summary:
输入数据以sRGB（gamma 2.2）颜色空间为单位。
原文： Input data is in sRGB (gamma 2.2) color space.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Srgb
member.summary:
指定此标志与指定srgbin和srgbout标志相同。
原文： Specifying this flag is the same as specifying the SrgbIn and SrgbOut flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Dither
member.summary:
生成的图像必须使用4x4有序抖动算法进行抖动。
原文： The resulting image must be dithered using a 4x4 ordered dither algorithm.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Mirror
member.summary:
指定此标志与指定mirroru、mirrorv和mirrorw标志相同。
原文： Specifying this flag is the same as specifying the MirrorU, MirrorV, and MirrorW flags.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.MirrorW
member.summary:
W轴上纹理边缘的像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the w-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.MirrorV
member.summary:
纹理边缘的V轴像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the v-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.MirrorU
member.summary:
U轴上纹理边缘的像素应该镜像，而不是包裹。
原文： Pixels off the edge of the texture on the u-axis should be mirrored, not wrapped.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Box
member.summary:
与MIPMAP一样。
原文： Each pixel is computed by averaging a 2x2(x2) box of pixels from the source image. This filter works only when the dimensions of the destination are half those of the source, as is the case with mipmaps.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Triangle
member.summary:
源图像中的每个像素对目标图像的贡献相等。这是最慢的过滤器。
原文： Every pixel in the source image contributes equally to the destination image. This is the slowest of the filters.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Linear
member.summary:
图像。当两个轴上的比例小于两个时，此过滤器工作得最好。
原文： Each destination pixel is computed by sampling the four nearest pixels from the source image. This filter works best when the scale on both axes is less than two.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Point
member.summary:
通过从源图像中采样最近的像素来计算每个目标像素。
原文： Each destination pixel is computed by sampling the nearest pixel from the source image.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.None
member.summary:
不会发生缩放或过滤。源图像边界之外的像素被假定为透明黑色。
原文： No scaling or filtering will take place. Pixels outside the bounds of the source image are assumed to be transparent black.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.Filter.Default
member.summary:
使用默认行为。
原文： Uses the default behavior.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CleanType.Simplification
member.summary:
使用此标志可在网格简化操作期间防止无限循环。
原文： Use this flag to prevent infinite loops during mesh simplification operations.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CleanType.Optimization
member.summary:
使用此标志可在网格优化操作期间防止无限循环。
原文： Use this flag to prevent infinite loops during mesh optimization operations.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CleanType.Skinning
member.summary:
使用此标志可防止在蒙皮设置网格操作期间出现无限循环。
原文： Use this flag to prevent infinite loops during skinning setup mesh operations.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CleanType.Bowties
member.summary:
影响两组不同的三角形。
原文： If a vertex is the apex of two triangle fans (a bowtie) and mesh operations will affect one of the fans, then split the shared vertex into two new vertices. Bowties can cause problems for operations such as mesh simplification that remove vertices, because removing one vertex affects two distinct sets of triangles.

member.name: F:SlimDX.Direct3D9.CleanType.BackFacing
member.summary:
添加复制顶点时，来自两个三角形的网格邻接数据可能会发生冲突。
原文： Merge triangles that share the same vertex indices but have face normals pointing in opposite directions (back-facing triangles). Unless the triangles are not split by adding a replicated vertex, mesh adjacency data from the two triangles may conflict.

member.name: P:SlimDX.Configuration.EnableObjectTracking
member.summary:

原文： Gets or sets whether SlimDX is currently tracking call stacks from object creation. If set to false, objects will not carry a call stack from when they were created. The default value is false.
member.remarks: Object tracking is a useful debugging facility, but may have a significant negative impact on performance. The default value is false.

member.remarks: This method performs the linear interpolation based on the following formula. color1 + (color2 - color1) * amount Passing a value of 0 will cause to be returned; a value of 1 will cause to be returned.
